1a1(mdo sde): /mdo sde aM bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pUr+Na pra mu kha a ba dA na sha ti ka/ bod skad du/ gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po dang po/ /
1b2(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdom ni/ gang po bzang dang grags ldan ma/ /le lo can dang ded dpon rnams/ /zla ba che ba pad ma dang / /pany+tsa
1b3(mdo sde): la dang bdug pa dang / /rgyal po mjug tu smos pa ste/ /'di ni sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /ljongs shig tu bram ze gang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i tshe sangs
1b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
1b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto
2a1(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
2a2(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas gsar du byung ste/ gsung rab kyi snying
2a3(mdo sde): khu 'thung ba'i dus la bab cing / lha dang mi man cad la yang dag par rab tu ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mngon
2a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon par 'jig rten thams cad du grags pas yongs su gang ngo / /de nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin
2a5(mdo sde): pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba dang / bdag
2a6(mdo sde): nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des re zhig na rab tu byung ba thams cad la mchod sbyin byas nas/ der mu stegs can la sogs pa stong
2b1(mdo sde): phrag du mas zan zos so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas/ de btul bas srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dul bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab nas gang po'i nye du rnams lhags te/ gang
2b2(mdo sde): po'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan thos nas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur to/ /de nas khang thog tu song nas rgyal po'i khab logs su kha bltas te 'dug nas pus mo
2b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyi lha nga sa la btsugs te/ me tog kyang gtor/ bdug pa dang chu yang phul nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod sbyin la gshegs su gsol/ mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sa gzigs su gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas
2b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog gi khang par gyur te 'dug go/ /bdug pa ni sprin gyi mgo lta bur gyur to/ /chu ni bai dUr+ya'i sdong bu lta bur gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
2b5(mdo sde): bos thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa spyan 'dren 'di ga las mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba 'dug pa der 'o bu cag 'dong dgos
2b6(mdo sde): kyis dge slong dag chos shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis zhabs 'bring byas nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sa dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas bram ze gang po
2b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ nyag gcig lhung bzed dang chu snod phyag na bsnams nas/ gang po dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan
3a1(mdo sde): 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba
3a2(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang shin tu rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol/ bdag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bshos gsol bar ci gnang
3a3(mdo sde): zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'di'i nang du byin cig /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyas g.yog byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs khur ba dang /
3a4(mdo sde): bshos dang / 'jams dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa la sogs pas lhung bzed 'gengs par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi lhung bzed kyi nang nas dge slong stong gi lhung bzed dag gi nang du zas de dag 'pho bar mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong gi
3a5(mdo sde): lhung bzed rnams gang bar thugs su chud pa de'i tshe nyid kyi lhung bzed gang bar bstan to/ /de nas dge slong stong lhung bzed gang ba zla ba tshes pa'i dbyibs lta bur 'khod pa bstan to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong stong gi
3a6(mdo sde): lhung bzed rnams gang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /de nas cho 'phrul bstan pa des bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po dga' bar gyur nas/ dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs shing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur te/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
3a7(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /
3b1(mdo sde): dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang
3b2(mdo sde): las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu
3b3(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur
3b4(mdo sde): rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems
3b5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa
3b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par kyang ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag
3b7(mdo sde): cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams
4a1(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /
4a2(mdo sde): tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams
4a3(mdo sde): dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med
4a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod
4a5(mdo sde): par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs te gal te bcom ldan 'das
4a6(mdo sde): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar
4a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor
4b1(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos
4b2(mdo sde): kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
4b3(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po
4b4(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra
4b5(mdo sde): thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the
4b6(mdo sde): tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
4b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa
5a1(mdo sde): mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos
5a2(mdo sde): yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po bzang zhes bya bar gyur te
5a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ gang pos
5a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sar bshos gsol te/ lhag par yang des dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yang dag par bskyed do/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /
5a5(mdo sde): bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
5a6(mdo sde): rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //grags ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
5a7(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
5b1(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
5b2(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs
5b3(mdo sde): 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /yangs pa can du mthar gyis bsod snyoms la gshegs nas dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas
5b4(mdo sde): dmag dpon seng ge'i mna' ma grags ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod pa des bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan dang dpe byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/ /des gyos po la dris pa bdag kyang 'di lta bu'i
5b5(mdo sde): yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i thabs 'ga' lta mchis sam/ de nas dmag dpon seng ge 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/ gal te 'di rkyen dang phrad na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro snyam
5b6(mdo sde): du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo gal te rgyu yang dag par blangs te 'dug na ni khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas dmag dpon seng ges grags ldan ma'i dad pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che mang du byin no/ /de nas grags ldan
5b7(mdo sde): mas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa phyi de nyin khyim gyi nang du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir gnang ngo / /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che'i me tog rnams kyang byed du
6a1(mdo sde): bcug / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa mang po dag kyang bsags/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang bshams nas bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na bcom ldan 'das
6a2(mdo sde): kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge
6a3(mdo sde): 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis gtor to/ /
6a4(mdo sde): de nas me tog de dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan can mgar ba'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de
6a5(mdo sde): lta bur gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
6a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /
6a7(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo grags ldan ma'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /
6b1(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe de'i zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa
6b2(mdo sde): de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang /
6b3(mdo sde): ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems
6b4(mdo sde): can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis
6b5(mdo sde): sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul
6b6(mdo sde): pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams
6b7(mdo sde): dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang /
7a1(mdo sde): tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang /
7a2(mdo sde): gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs
7a3(mdo sde): rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par
7a4(mdo sde): byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
7a5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
7a6(mdo sde): su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
7a7(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
7b1(mdo sde): chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/
7b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /
7b3(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i
7b4(mdo sde): 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa
7b5(mdo sde): yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de
7b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bu mo grags ldan ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo grags ldan ma
7b7(mdo sde): 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
8a1(mdo sde): byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur de 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
8a2(mdo sde): de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //le lo can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
8a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
8a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas mchod pa byas te lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
8a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
8a6(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa
8a7(mdo sde): las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang / bu yang med bu mo yang med nas de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med
8b1(mdo sde): pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha
8b2(mdo sde): la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/ /'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los
8b3(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs
8b4(mdo sde): pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams dang / ltas mkhan rnams dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag rnams kyis de la tho btsams nas/ de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang chu lha dang
8b5(mdo sde): ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig
8b6(mdo sde): skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/ /bud med mkhas pa'i
8b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang / bu chags pa shes pa dang gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang / khye'u yang shes
9a1(mdo sde): la bu mo yang shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/ /gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so/ /de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa jo bo bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum
9a2(mdo sde): g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/ de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi
9a3(mdo sde): bu rung bar shog shig / mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig /gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig /nor skal la spyod par shog shig /bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig /bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang
9a4(mdo sde): bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i
9a5(mdo sde): phyir/ khang steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba
9a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/ kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams sten cing / do shal dang
9a7(mdo sde): se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu
9b1(mdo sde): lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de btsas pa'i tshe khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur te de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams
9b2(mdo sde): na re 'di btsas pa na khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dga' byed ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming dga' byed ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u dga' byed pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
9b3(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du
9b4(mdo sde): skyed cher drag par gyur to/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes te lo lnga'am drug lon pa de'i tshe/ le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur te mal dang stan las kyang ldang mi 'dod do/ /de blo rno zhing gsal bas khyim gyi nang du 'dug bzhin du bstan bcos rnams bslabs so/ /de nas
9b5(mdo sde): tshong dpon de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis lha mnyes par byas nas/ brgya lam na lan gcig na bu skyes pa de yang le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur te mal dang stan las kyang mi ldang na 'di ltar lus tha mal par gyur kyang grum po bzhin du lnga re 'dug pa 'di 'dra ba'i bu lta
9b6(mdo sde): ci dgos snyam mo/ /tshong dpon de yang rdzogs byed la dga' ste/ des mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug rang gi khyim du bos nas/ gal te khye'u 'dis de dag mthong na rjes bskyed de mal nas ldang ba tsam yang byed srid dam snyam pa dang / de nas khye'u le lo can gyis ston pa de dag
9b7(mdo sde): mthong nas mig gis kyang ma bltas na ldang ba'am gus par smra ba'am stan bstabs pa lta ci smos/ de nas tshong dpon des gnas skabs de lta bu mthong nas ches rab tu gdung bar gyur te lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas
10a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig
10a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu
10a3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las
10a4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
10a5(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
10a6(mdo sde): la gzigs te/ su ni rgud su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho
10a7(mdo sde): ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa rnams las
10b1(mdo sde): bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /
10b2(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyis nga mthong na brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sems yongs su 'gyur bar 'ong ngo snyam du
10b3(mdo sde): gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa dang / dregs pa gcad pa dang / khye'u'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so
10b4(mdo sde): bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur nas/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus rab tu sim par byas snyam ste/ des phan tshun du bltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
10b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te khyim de'i nang du gshegs nas khye'u le lo can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas
10b6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' bar gyur te 'phral la rang nyid langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa
10b7(mdo sde): legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad kyang smras so/ /de nas de'i pha ma dang nang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i gus par sgrim pa mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas khye'u le lo can gyis dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i
11a1(mdo sde): mig dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la le lo'i nyes pa dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon rnam pa du ma bka' stsal nas/ tsan dan gyi dbyug gu zhig kyang de la
11a2(mdo sde): byin te khye'u dbyug gu 'di rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas des dbyug gu de brdungs pa dang / sgra snyan pa thos par gyur la rin po che'i gter sna tshogs kyang mthong ngo / /de nas de 'di snyam du sems de/ kye ma brtson 'grus rtsom pa la ni khyad par chen po de lta bu yod kyis/
11a3(mdo sde): bdag gis phyir zhing brtson 'grus brtsam par bya gor ma chag snyam nas des mnyan du yod par dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ bdag nyid kyis ded dpon bya bar bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po la lan drug rgal te gru'i don grub pas rin po che chen po bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
11a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyi rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas
11a5(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /
11a6(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams
11a7(mdo sde): dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar
11b1(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
11b2(mdo sde): sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams
11b3(mdo sde): rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du
11b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams
11b5(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che
11b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ /
11b7(mdo sde): nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal
12a1(mdo sde): zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed
12a2(mdo sde): na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung
12a3(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
12a4(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung
12a5(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
12a6(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /
12a7(mdo sde): mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /
12b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po
12b2(mdo sde): dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
12b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong
12b4(mdo sde): ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje
12b5(mdo sde): chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang /
12b6(mdo sde): mthu rtsal dang shin tu ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
12b7(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ ded dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor
13a1(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
13a2(mdo sde): sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na
13a3(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
13a4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon chen po zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du gru bub ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du lha thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs na 'on kyang gru bub ste phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas de mi dga' ba chen po
13a5(mdo sde): skyes nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis thabs gang gis nor bsdu bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni lha thams cad las kyang ches khyad par du 'phags te/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
13a6(mdo sde): pa/ thugs rje can bdag nyid chen po chos la gus pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa yin gyis/ da ni bdag gis 'di la brten te yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la gru'i don legs par grub ste phyir 'ongs nas/ nor phyed kyis 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/ /des de ltar
13a7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus byas te/ yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/ rin po che chen po bsdus te bde ba dang nye zho med par bdag gi khyim du phyin to/ /de ngal bso nas snod bzlugs na/ des rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas chags pa
13b1(mdo sde): chen po skyes te/ bdag gis rin po che 'di lta bu dag dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyed ji ltar sbyin snyam du sems pa la zhugs te ma la bdag gis 'di rnams bdag gi chung ma'i lag tu zho'i bzhi cha gcig tu btsongs la/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /
13b2(mdo sde): des zho'i bzhi cha gcig gis a ga ru'i spos nyos nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas shin tu ngo tsha ba bzhin du sgo gang du 'dug nas a ga rus bdugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis bdug pa de steng gi nam mkha' la yang dag par 'phags te
13b3(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa thams cad khyab par gyur nas sprin chen po'i mgo ltar 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mdzad do/ /des lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ bdag gi sems la brgyad bkag
13b4(mdo sde): nas/ gang bdag gis rin po che'i sgo nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bslu ba 'di ni bdag gi cha ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas
13b5(mdo sde): nas rin po che chen po dag gis gtor to/ /de nas rin po che de dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ rin po che'i khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa rin
13b6(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal mtshan can mgar ba'am mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta bur gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de mthong nas ched kyis dga' ba skyes te/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
13b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs
14a1(mdo sde): ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas
14a2(mdo sde): gcig du brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig
14a3(mdo sde): ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams
14a4(mdo sde): thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa
14a5(mdo sde): de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom
14a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
14a7(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du
14b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun
14b2(mdo sde): na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras
14b3(mdo sde): bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa
14b4(mdo sde): gnyis kyang rjod par byed do/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor
14b5(mdo sde): ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las
14b6(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
14b7(mdo sde): dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur
15a1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur
15a2(mdo sde): ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i
15a3(mdo sde): gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
15a4(mdo sde): tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /
15a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /
15a6(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsum mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni
15a7(mdo sde): khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /
15b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo ded dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo ded dpon 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag
15b2(mdo sde): par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang
15b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom
15b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
15b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
15b6(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
15b7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan du yod pa na tha ga pa zla ba zhes bya ba dbul zhing mchog tu dbul ba zhig gnas so/ /de yang las ji tsam zhig byed pa de tsam nyi
16a1(mdo sde): tshe'i zan rnyed par zad de/ des cung zad kyang gzhag tu med do/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bsod nams ma byas par 'dir 'ongs la/ 'dir yang dge ba mi byed pas 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu yang bsod nams
16a2(mdo sde): kyang ma byas/ dge ba yang ma byas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon skyabs kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos srid kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sna 'ga' zhig gis mchod pa bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi ras btags nas/ des
16a3(mdo sde): de las ras kyi tshar tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
16a4(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dga'
16a5(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyid kyi chos gos ral bar bstan to/ /de nas des ras kyi tshar tshar de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i mod la chos gos drubs par bstan to/ /de nas de rgya cher
16a6(mdo sde): dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa chung la zhing ni rgya che ste/ /mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud par bas/ /sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag ni rgya cher grags pa'i sangs rgyas shog /sbyin pa 'di ni chung ngu
16a7(mdo sde): lags kyis kyang / /bdag gi sems ni rab yangs dpag yas te/ /mi dang lha mchog rgyal bas bzhes nas ni/ /sbyin pa chung yang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni phyi mar zhi ba mthu che ba/ /rgya chen grags pa mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /
16b1(mdo sde): rang byung 'jig rten phan pa snying brtser ldan/ /tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tha ga pa zla ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
16b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba
16b3(mdo sde): yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang /
16b4(mdo sde): pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
16b5(mdo sde): rnams ni rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
16b6(mdo sde): te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/
16b7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
17a1(mdo sde): 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med
17a2(mdo sde): 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang /
17a3(mdo sde): shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la
17a4(mdo sde): sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /
17a5(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i
17a6(mdo sde): las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung
17a7(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i
17b1(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
17b2(mdo sde): na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
17b3(mdo sde): gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis
17b4(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo
17b5(mdo sde): yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas
17b6(mdo sde): rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos
18a1(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
18a2(mdo sde): bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa
18a3(mdo sde): 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
18a4(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
18a5(mdo sde): bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza'
18a6(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na
18a7(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu che ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas so/ /de yang khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa shas che ba zhig ste/ rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug la mchod pa byed do/ /de phyis nad tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te de sman pa dang / sman dang / nad g.yog med de shi la thug nas 'di snyam
18b1(mdo sde): du sems te/ da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i skyabs byed pa'am srog phangs pa sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de nas de ltar bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
18b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/
18b3(mdo sde): zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil
18b4(mdo sde): shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug
18b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan
18b6(mdo sde): pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing
18b7(mdo sde): 'dug / su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni
19a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
19a2(mdo sde): bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs
19a3(mdo sde): rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/ 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms
19a4(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo gang du gshegs nas sgo srungs kyi mis bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so zhes de la sbran to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu che ba dga' bar
19a5(mdo sde): gyur te/ dbugs mi phyin pa dbugs phyin par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs nas gdan
19a6(mdo sde): bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba la bka' stsal pa/ che ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhig yod/ che bas gsol pa/ bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la sems can thams
19a7(mdo sde): cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gdams ngag bstan te/ 'di ni khyod kyi sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sman shi ri ka khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam
19b1(mdo sde): du dgongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sman shi ri ka blangs te bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes nas che ba la byin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi
19b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal tsha ba zhi bar byed pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas des lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /sems dga' bar gyur nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la bsnyad de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
19b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa bshos gsol nas/ 'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul te/ me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /de nas sems la rtas par byas te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su
19b4(mdo sde): gtong ba 'dis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs
19b5(mdo sde): ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum
19b6(mdo sde): pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin
19b7(mdo sde): pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang /
20a1(mdo sde): ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te
20a2(mdo sde): 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul
20a3(mdo sde): pa 'gyed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur
20a4(mdo sde): to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang
20a5(mdo sde): yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs
20a6(mdo sde): pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi
20a7(mdo sde): gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par
20b1(mdo sde): gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur
20b2(mdo sde): zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang
20b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar
20b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi
20b5(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
20b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan
20b7(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs
21a1(mdo sde): rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub
21a2(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po
21a3(mdo sde): dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan
21a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis nga la 'di lta
21a5(mdo sde): bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag
21a6(mdo sde): par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
21a7(mdo sde): thub pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
21b1(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do/ / //pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
21b2(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
21b3(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
21b4(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i snga rol na ni/ rgyal po gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la ni dus gsum du me tog dang / bdug
21b5(mdo sde): pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams kyis rjed par byed do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas ni/ gzhon nu lta bu'i mdo'i dpes rgyal po gsal rgyal btul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de'i tshe dga' ba dang yid bde ba
21b6(mdo sde): skyes nas dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro zhing / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re zhig na kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma zhig gis/ me tog pad ma gsar du byung ba zhig khyer te/
21b7(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du mnyan du yod par song ba dang / mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen zhig gis mthong nas/ kye mi pha gi pad ma 'o ni 'tshong ngam zhes dris so/ /de na re 'tshong ngo zhes zer ro/ /de nyo 'dod pa las re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der phyin te/ des de las
