63b1(mdo sde): dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa
63b2(mdo sde): zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan pa 'dug go/ /rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de bu med
63b3(mdo sde): nas bu 'dod de gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang /
63b4(mdo sde): gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/
63b5(mdo sde): gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags
63b6(mdo sde): langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la des skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad ma tshad las
63b7(mdo sde): 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /phyis re zhig na nyi ma 'char kar pad ma de kha
64a1(mdo sde): bye nas pad ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu
64a2(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ de'i kha nas ni pad ma'i dri 'byung la/ lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang
64a3(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong nas/ khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/ yab tshur gshegs bdag ni khyod sras mi mnga' ba'i sras lags so/ /de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas smras pa/
64a4(mdo sde): bu de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/ pad ma'i snying po las khye'u blangs te lag par bzhag go/ /de nas khye'u des gang dang gang du rkang pa bzhag pa de dang der pad ma dag byung ngo / de nas de'i ming tsan dan zhes btags so/ /gang gi tshe khye'u
64a5(mdo sde): tsan dan khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na lha sras tsan dan btang ba'i rigs so/ /'on kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la gnas thams cad kyang pad mas brgyan
64a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa de ltar bya'o/ /de nas tsan dan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ blon po'i bu rnams kyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing grong khyer gyi dus ston myong bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyi rol du
64a7(mdo sde): byung ngo / /de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad ma blta na sdug cing yid 'phrog pa dag byung ste/ de dag la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyis shing skams so/ /de nas sems can dag pa bsam pa dge ba sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa des de mthong nas
64b1(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa skyes te/ ji ltar pad ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes par 'dug la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pas ni/ rnyis shing skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo/ /de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/ byang chub
64b2(mdo sde): kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na/ 'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas re zhig na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te de dag bgos nas/
64b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ de mthong bas rgyal po dang blon po dang grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
64b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ni de las byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so/ /dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na/ des de'i lus kyang dri bda' la dbang po lnga yang rno bar
64b5(mdo sde): gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des der dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba yang phul/ me tog dag kyang btags te/ der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang
64b6(mdo sde): bsgoms so/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mo bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar
64b7(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
65a1(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
65a2(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
65a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
65a4(mdo sde): yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma rnams kyis pad ma dag blangs te srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /
65a5(mdo sde): bud med cig kyang khye'u zhig pang na thogs te srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i
65a6(mdo sde): 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te blo thor du lag pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma las pad ma blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro/ /de nas pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te steng gi
65a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma ra ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/ des mnyan du yod par ril gyis snang bar byas so/ /rgyu des na rgyal po dang blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi
65b1(mdo sde): rnams dad par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung
65b2(mdo sde): nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang /
65b3(mdo sde): chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar
65b4(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan
65b5(mdo sde): du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung
65b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du
65b7(mdo sde): bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan
66a1(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang /
66a2(mdo sde): dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
66a3(mdo sde): dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos
66a4(mdo sde): 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi
66a5(mdo sde): bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung
66a6(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston
66a7(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du
66b1(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar
66b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar
66b3(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /
66b4(mdo sde): yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo
66b5(mdo sde): yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas
66b6(mdo sde): rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
66b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la pad ma 'thor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa
67a1(mdo sde): dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rang sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems
67a2(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de
67a3(mdo sde): dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
67a4(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
67a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
67a6(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ de'i chung ma lang tsho la bab pa de/ khyim thab la
67a7(mdo sde): gdung zhing yongs su yi chad la smre sngags 'don kyang de'i khyim thab ma 'ongs nas/ des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te dam bcas pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim thab myur du 'ongs na bdag gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbul lo zhes byas so/ /de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho
67b1(mdo sde): chen po'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs so/ /de nas des gser gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/ de bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor bas 'khor lo dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so/ /de'i skabs su sangs
67b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang
67b3(mdo sde): ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu
67b4(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las
67b5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis
67b6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas
67b7(mdo sde): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/
68a1(mdo sde): su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/
68a2(mdo sde): su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams
68a3(mdo sde): kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo des nga mthong na rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro snyam du gzigs so/ /de nas bcom
68a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku
68a5(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ /rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /de nas
68a6(mdo sde): mthong ba'i mod la dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so/ /de nas bran mos bkag ste 'di sred med kyi bu ma yin no zhes byas so/ /'on kyang de bkag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
68a7(mdo sde): kyi steng du gser gyi 'khor lo bor ro/ /spos dang bdug pa dang me tog kyang phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang /
68b1(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang /
68b2(mdo sde): mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni
68b3(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on
68b4(mdo sde): te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma
68b5(mdo sde): byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden
68b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul
68b7(mdo sde): dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang /
69a1(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba
69a2(mdo sde): dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos
69a3(mdo sde): 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
69a4(mdo sde): kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar
69a5(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par
69a6(mdo sde): bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
69a7(mdo sde): lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag
69b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
69b2(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang
69b3(mdo sde): bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong
69b4(mdo sde): rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang
69b5(mdo sde): gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
69b6(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong
69b7(mdo sde): ba 'dis/ bskal pa lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rang sangs rgyas 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar
70a1(mdo sde): bslab par bya ste sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
70a2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
70a3(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
70a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
70a5(mdo sde): brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong
70a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung lags/
70a7(mdo sde): ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa gang las byung ba dang ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge
70b1(mdo sde): slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo
70b2(mdo sde): legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go/ /rgyal
70b3(mdo sde): po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig ste chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de nas rgyal po de/ bu med nas bu 'dod de gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te
70b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig
70b5(mdo sde): rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur
70b6(mdo sde): ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar gyur te gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar
70b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos gang ba/ 'gram ngang pa dang ngur pa dang zal mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig
71a1(mdo sde): yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig blo tol du skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par srungs
71a2(mdo sde): shig ces bsgo'o/ /phyis re zhig na nyi ma 'char kar pad ma de kha bye nas pad ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/
71a3(mdo sde): sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas
71a4(mdo sde): rgyal pos thos nas blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong ste/ pad ma'i snying po la de lta bur mdzes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas
71a5(mdo sde): khye'u de blangs te bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ mgo bcu pa zhes ming btags so/ /de nas khye'u mgo bcu
71a6(mdo sde): pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par
71a7(mdo sde): bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan la bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa
71b1(mdo sde): zhig ste/ des yab rgyal sa na 'dug na/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dag byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/ yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad
71b2(mdo sde): du gsol zhes byas so/ /yab kyis kyang gnang ste de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de nas des lung mnos pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du
71b3(mdo sde): gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas/ nam mkha' la 'phags te yab la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nas de lus thogs pas yongs su skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam
71b4(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs bstan te/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste de'i mchod rten 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang
71b5(mdo sde): dag bgyis na ma'i mngal du ma skyes te/ pad ma las skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
71b6(mdo sde): las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang /
71b7(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal
72a1(mdo sde): pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
72a2(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
72a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/
72a4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /ded dpon zhig kyang pad ma khyer te srang du zhugs so/ /de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
72a5(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan 'das
72a6(mdo sde): kyi steng du bor te/ bor ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do/ /de nas re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang byang
72a7(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang / de'i skabs su de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing 'dug ste skad ngan 'don nas/ des bran mo la de ci zhig ces dris so/ /des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do/ /de nas ded dpon de mi dga' bar
72b1(mdo sde): gyur nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag nam yang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin te/
72b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du nam yang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha ma la yang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur
72b3(mdo sde): sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
72b4(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi
72b5(mdo sde): 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
72b6(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
72b7(mdo sde): ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba nor dang yo byad mang ba bdag dbang ba mang ba/ mdza' bo dang blon po dang nye du dang rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag
73a1(mdo sde): la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma
73a2(mdo sde): yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma
73a3(mdo sde): chag snyam mo/ /de nas des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol ba dang gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs so/ /de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs
73a4(mdo sde): 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegs so/ /de nas tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te bsro khang du song nas bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas
73a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /
73a6(mdo sde): rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te bstsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
73a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du ma yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
73b1(mdo sde): du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te sems la rtas par byas so/ /de nas bcom
73b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu
73b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a
73b4(mdo sde): chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /
73b5(mdo sde): des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed
73b6(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to
73b7(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa
74a1(mdo sde): de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /
74a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang /
74a3(mdo sde): mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam
74a4(mdo sde): par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /
74a5(mdo sde): zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su
74a6(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi
74a7(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i
74b1(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi
74b2(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis
74b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi
74b4(mdo sde): sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra
74b5(mdo sde): thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi bla yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag
74b6(mdo sde): gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
74b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa
75a1(mdo sde): mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la
75a2(mdo sde): sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
75a3(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ 'od bsil zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon
75a4(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto
75a5(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
75a6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
75a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang
75b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug
75b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis bdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
75b3(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/ spos sna tshogs kyi snod ni bkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/
75b4(mdo sde): me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so/ /de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang / khur ba dang / bshos rnams kyang sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod la bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na bcom
75b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag
75b6(mdo sde): de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim
75b7(mdo sde): par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te bstsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te
76a1(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam
76a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te sems la rtas
76a3(mdo sde): par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /
76a4(mdo sde): kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams
76a5(mdo sde): dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar
76a6(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa
76a7(mdo sde): 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to
76b1(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag
76b2(mdo sde): ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams
76b3(mdo sde): dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom
76b4(mdo sde): snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /
76b5(mdo sde): 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
76b6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
76b7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston
77a1(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur
77a2(mdo sde): ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
77a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te
77a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes
77a5(mdo sde): spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /
77a6(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal
77a7(mdo sde): chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la
77b1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la
77b2(mdo sde): sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs
77b3(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
77b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
77b5(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
77b6(mdo sde): pa/ yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams
77b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig /mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ gru btsas stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du lhung
78a1(mdo sde): ba las bsgral/ sor phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/ bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa ni nga rgyal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/ steng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral te 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma blangs so/ /de skad ces
78a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs so/ /de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de yang mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
78a3(mdo sde): bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas dge slong rnams grur zhugs pa dang bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas sems dga' bar gyur te zhabs
78a4(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ mnyan pa des de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
78a5(mdo sde): byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag
78a6(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis
78a7(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam
78b1(mdo sde): dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang shi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras
78b2(mdo sde): bu yod/ /de'i nang nas mnyan pa gcig cig 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni
78b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang
78b4(mdo sde): sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa
78b5(mdo sde): dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /
78b6(mdo sde): de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di
78b7(mdo sde): nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar
79a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams
79a2(mdo sde): dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung
79a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag
79a4(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /
79a5(mdo sde): gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi
79a6(mdo sde): bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par
79a7(mdo sde): bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi
79b1(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
79b2(mdo sde): na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
79b3(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das
79b4(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /
79b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu
79b6(mdo sde): mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen
79b7(mdo sde): nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga
80a1(mdo sde): la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i
80a2(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
80a3(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
80a4(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
80a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
80a6(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa'i yul mi rnams kyis lugs kyis na phal cher byug pa sna tshogs kyi lus skud par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na
80a7(mdo sde): khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i tsan dan dmar po bdar zhing 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge
80b1(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
80b2(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen po skyes so/ /de nas de dad pa rnyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas bcom ldan
80b3(mdo sde): 'das la bkur sti byed mi nus na bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo/ /de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas te/ lag pa gnyi ga tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i
80b4(mdo sde): khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan gyi dris gang bar mdzad do/ /de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de mthong nas sems dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas sems la rtas par byas te/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs
80b5(mdo sde): su gtong ba 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po
80b6(mdo sde): dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang /
80b7(mdo sde): mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te
81a1(mdo sde): 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te
81a2(mdo sde): gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma
81a3(mdo sde): byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa
81a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
81a5(mdo sde): byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams
81a6(mdo sde): dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /
81a7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor
81b1(mdo sde): ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston
81b2(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar
81b3(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
81b4(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu
81b5(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
81b6(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /
81b7(mdo sde): mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /
82a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa
82a2(mdo sde): dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom
82a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i
82a4(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga
82a5(mdo sde): la sems dang bar byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag
82a6(mdo sde): yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
82a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
82b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi
82b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma zhig yod de/ des so shing zhig khyer te mnyan du yod par song ngo / /ltas mkhan
82b3(mdo sde): zhig kyang sgo ka na 'dug ste/ de na re so shing 'di su za ba de ni zas ro brgya dang ldan pa za bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas tshig de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ so shing 'di gang la byin na de'i rgyus bdag cher bkur bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/ /
82b4(mdo sde): yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten na bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gro ba 'bras bu yod pa yin gyis/ bdag gis 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des so shing
82b5(mdo sde): de khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
82b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshems shing 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas bzhes so/ /bzhes nas kyang de kun
82b7(mdo sde): dga' ra ba'i srung ma'i mdun du gsol to/ /gsol nas kyang so shing de sa la btsugs so/ /de nas btsugs pa'i mod da kho na'i skad cig la yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po chu zheng gab pa zhig tu gyur te/ de'i grib ma
83a1(mdo sde): la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas lha dang mi du ma la chos bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol to/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul gyis sems dad par byas
83a2(mdo sde): nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
83a3(mdo sde): rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig
83a4(mdo sde): nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar
83a5(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de
83a6(mdo sde): dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas
