124b7(mdo sde): cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/
125a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni phyi bzhin song / /'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de dag myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos
125a2(mdo sde): bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i
125a3(mdo sde): bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom
125a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par
125a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas sngon su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang /
125a6(mdo sde): spr-i ka la la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/
125a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang
125b1(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo/ /de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /der bcom
125b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis mang po dag lha'i nang du bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos bstan nas de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mthong bar
125b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba rnyed nas dong ba de ni/ /khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te legs so legs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/
125b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti byas so/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ci nas de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
125b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //chu smad ces bya ba ni/
125b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
125b7(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
126a1(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
126a2(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
126a3(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig btsas nas de
126a4(mdo sde): btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rgyu skar chu smad la btsas pas na de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming chu smad ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed
126a5(mdo sde): bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de'i pha shi ba dang rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/ /de nas des tshong 'dus bkram nas nyo 'tshong byed cing nyo 'tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las de nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang dam pa'i
126a6(mdo sde): chos thos pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig /de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu gcig
126a7(mdo sde): pa yin gyis bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar rab tu ma byung shig / bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro/ /chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas
126b1(mdo sde): so/ /de'i ma de ni brkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste kAr ShA pa Na de dag sbas nas/ dge slong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro/ /
126b2(mdo sde): bu de la yang slu bar byed de/ bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro/ /phyis re zhig na de shi ba dang de su skyes nas bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed do/ /sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas
126b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
126b4(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra
126b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas
126b6(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gang gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i spyil po byas te bsam gtan byed do/ /de'i ma kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de yang sdong dum me reg 'dra la gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi
126b7(mdo sde): mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi thad du song nas re zhig na chu smad kyis mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig /mos smras pa/ bu gcig gang
127a1(mdo sde): las btsas pa yi/ /byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/ /zas dang skom dang bral ba yi/ /rnams kyi nang du skyes/ /bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te/ /chu yi bag kyang ma mthong na/ /kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong / /'bras bur ldan
127a2(mdo sde): pa'i shing rnams kyi/ /drung song de dag 'bras med 'gyur/ /gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang / /de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/ /btsun pa'i shing drung bde ba lags/ /khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil/ /bkren pa bdag la thugs rje skyed/ /skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol
127a3(mdo sde): cig / de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras pa/ yum khyod mir gyur pa'i tshe bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag
127a4(mdo sde): thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so/ /bu gcig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig /'on kyang bdag kyi skye gnas nas thar yang srid do/ /chu smad kyis
127a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ de ltar bgyi yis khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug shig /mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngos mi thub bo/ /chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha nad ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo
127a6(mdo sde): tsha/ mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o/ /de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
127a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/ mo de yang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis mo de mthong ngo / /de dag gis mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas shin tu skyo ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar
127b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sbyin
127b2(mdo sde): pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni phyi bzhin song / /'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas mo de
127b3(mdo sde): dang skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /mo de yang sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul
127b4(mdo sde): chen mor skyes par shes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum da ni mthu yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bdag gyis shig /rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad
127b5(mdo sde): kyis rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi/ /khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med pa/ /rus pa pags pa skyi rnams da dung 'dug /ces byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis
127b6(mdo sde): lan mang du spyos nas smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu de las ras zung cig thob bo/ /de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul te/ gang gis dge 'dun las ras zung cig nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi gdang la bzhag go/ /de nas mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus so/ /de nas dge
127b7(mdo sde): slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas chu smad song ste mo spyos nas phyir bkug ste byin no/ /de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las brkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de gshegs nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong
128a1(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la glan to/ /de nas des phyin chad ma brkus so/ /de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser snas mtho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas kyang mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la
128a2(mdo sde): brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
128a3(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
128a4(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
128a5(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
128a6(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la
128a7(mdo sde): song ngo / /mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du 'dug pa rang gi
128b1(mdo sde): skras yog pa lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la bab ste dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal
128b2(mdo sde): drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sring mo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug /
128b3(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom
128b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las
128b5(mdo sde): chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs sa zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
128b6(mdo sde): dga' byed tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gis mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du mchis pa rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni
128b7(mdo sde): ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnad la bab ste dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi
129a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug /rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /
129a2(mdo sde): rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/ /nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /de yis mi yi
129a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam par
129a4(mdo sde): smin pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin
129a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya
129a6(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI de na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan
129a7(mdo sde): du lta bar gyur te/ des pha ma la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas/ de de na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re zhig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i
129b1(mdo sde): gzhi la lhod par byas so/ /de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do/ /de nas des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba'ang gcod du bcug /slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod/ dge
129b2(mdo sde): slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go/ /dga' byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni su skyes so/ /des nar
129b3(mdo sde): ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor to/ /des slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas ni de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to/ /
129b4(mdo sde): dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /
129b5(mdo sde): dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /
129b6(mdo sde): der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas/ ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
129b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
130a1(mdo sde): tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
130a2(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
130a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
130a4(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
130a5(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/
130a6(mdo sde): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/
130a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kun la grags pa dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par
130b1(mdo sde): gyur te/ gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog gsog par byed de des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so/ /de nas ser sna kun
130b2(mdo sde): tu sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du su skyes so/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN+DI mjug med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo / /de nas de'i rus bu la rus
130b3(mdo sde): bu'i mchod pa byas nas phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /de nas gnas khang gi sgo phye ste/ chos gos dang lhung bzed g.yar snga 'grim pa la zhugs pa dang / re zhig na rkang lag dang mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs pa chos gos dang lhung bzed
130b4(mdo sde): 'dzin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas dge slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gdags pa dang slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyo bskyed pa dang ser sna'i rnam par smin pa
130b5(mdo sde): mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te gnas der gshegs so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan
130b6(mdo sde): pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te
130b7(mdo sde): ngo tsha bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis de spyos te bzhin khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na su skyes pa yin gyis
131a1(mdo sde): da yang nga la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes re/ /de nas des chos gos dang lhung bzed dge 'dun la phul nas/ bcom ldan
131a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni phyi bzhin song / 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur
131a3(mdo sde): cig / de nas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs
131a4(mdo sde): kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal
131a5(mdo sde): bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos
131a6(mdo sde): nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tsom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
131a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po'am
131b1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ de shi nas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong
131b2(mdo sde): dpon las su gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
131b3(mdo sde): dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
131b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
131b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
131b6(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /
131b7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo / /rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi
132a1(mdo sde): dgas kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nye 'khor du mo gshin rje'i sring mo 'dra ba la/ lus khrag gis bsgos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug
132a2(mdo sde): bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug /
132a3(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyed la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
132a4(mdo sde): pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang
132a5(mdo sde): po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
132a6(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni kyi nang du mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der
132a7(mdo sde): bdag gis mo gshin rje'i sring mo 'dra ba la/ lus khrag gis bsgos pa/ dur khrod na gnas pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'/ /mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste/ /btsas
132b1(mdo sde): nas de dag zos na yang / /'grangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchi na/ /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu
132b2(mdo sde): mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
132b3(mdo sde): dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon phyug cing / nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig
132b4(mdo sde): tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams
132b5(mdo sde): cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste
132b6(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab
132b7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas
133a1(mdo sde): gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/
133a2(mdo sde): des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma byung bu mo yang ma byung nas de'i blo 'di lta bu dag skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs na/ brgya la bu yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
133a3(mdo sde): mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'byung bar nges kyis
133a4(mdo sde): dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg /lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ /bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed
133a5(mdo sde): par shog cig / gsos pa'i lan phyir gas bar shog cig /nor skal la spyod par shog cig /bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig /bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod
133a6(mdo sde): nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i
133a7(mdo sde): yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tsha che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha
133b1(mdo sde): cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du/ khri'i steng nas khri'i
133b2(mdo sde): steng dang khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas par
133b3(mdo sde): gyur na ni bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo/ 'dod pa las yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa des yid rton du bcug nas/ gang 'thungs pa
133b4(mdo sde): tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no/ /de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal lce la bkug ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug nas mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te des bdag gi bu 'phyil to
133b5(mdo sde): zhes byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na bdag mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi chung
133b6(mdo sde): mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na mor skyes so/ /des byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis
133b7(mdo sde): ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma
134a1(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po bcu gnyis pa/ phyis
134a2(mdo sde): khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
134a3(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
134a4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u
134a5(mdo sde): rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs zhig gi nang na zas su skyugs pa za ba/ bor ba za ba ngar snabs dang gcin gyis 'tsho ba rnag dang khrag dang phyi sa za ba mi bzad pa rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal
134a6(mdo sde): ba lnga brgya gnas so/ /yang smras pa/ skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za/ /ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang / /rnag khrag dang ni phyi sa za/ /mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug /yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang
134a7(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro/ /
134b1(mdo sde): re zhig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u mdog ngan zhing blta na mi sdug la byad ngan pa lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so/ /de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi byams pa'i dbang gis sbrel bas pha ma gnyis kyis gsos so/ /de mi gtsang ba'i gnas
134b2(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang phyis khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas de'i ming phyis khung phyis khung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /re zhig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams
134b3(mdo sde): su dga' ba las na 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo/ /des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la legs pa byed pa la yang gnas so/ /de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi
134b4(mdo sde): dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to/ /phyis re zhig na khye'u phyis khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo / /

134b6(mdo sde): stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phongs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis phongs/
134b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/ des lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do/ /de nas de dag bcom
135a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam

135a4(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba

135b1(mdo sde): pa de nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas khye'u phyis khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang de dag ma mthong ngo / /de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do/ /

136a1(mdo sde): bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/

136b1(mdo sde): su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod

137a1(mdo sde): khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za
137a2(mdo sde): bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ phyis khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams

137a6(mdo sde): cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag cig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so/ /gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yang
137a7(mdo sde): gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do/ /dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas cher dga'
137b1(mdo sde): zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do/ /phyis re zhig na ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te phyi de nyin dge
137b2(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las re zhig na phyi de nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/ bshos kyang bshams pa las dge slong gzhi ba de yang 'ongs te/ de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar
137b3(mdo sde): song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/ des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang
137b4(mdo sde): sla'i sbyin bdag 'di lta bu bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs pa 'di las ches mi bzad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so/ /re zhig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa na dge
137b5(mdo sde): slong gzhi ba des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so/ /de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod par gsol lo zhes byas so/ /
137b6(mdo sde): de nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ de nas de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te shad kyis sbyangs so/ /'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i
137b7(mdo sde): ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so/ /de nas re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig /
138a1(mdo sde): bdag gis bklag pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang sbyin pa dang sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig ces
138a2(mdo sde): byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyis khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/
138a3(mdo sde): las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang / 'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la mi gtsang ba dang snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to/ /des kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la
138a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab
138a5(mdo sde): par bya ste/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyis khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyod kyis de
138a6(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rtogs
138a7(mdo sde): pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so/ / //sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang / /sA la dang ni dpal ldan ma/ /gos dang ne tso pho nya dang / /ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang / /ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin/ /sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
138b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am
138b2(mdo sde): ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
138b3(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
138b4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de yang ser sna can 'jungs pa/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la
138b5(mdo sde): yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do/ /de nas des rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o/ /de shi nas
138b6(mdo sde): de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu yang che ge mo'i skyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad
138b7(mdo sde): brlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs pa de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/ /
139a1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
139a2(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang
139a3(mdo sde): dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
139a4(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa/ sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan
139a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das
139a6(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer
139a7(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par
139b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang / /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
139b2(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems skyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom
139b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par lhung bar byas so/ /da yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di nas shi 'phos
139b4(mdo sde): nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes re/ de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar med/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/ /
139b5(mdo sde): don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/ /'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i
139b6(mdo sde): tshal du bsnams so/ /de'i skabs su rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+hA'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa des rang gi lus la smad de kha 'tshos nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas/
139b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa
140a1(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi
140a2(mdo sde): cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ /
140a3(mdo sde): lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar
140a4(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
140a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i
140a6(mdo sde): tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu
140a7(mdo sde): ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang
140b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten
140b2(mdo sde): nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis/ /thub pa khyed ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /
140b3(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'chang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar
140b4(mdo sde): gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar
140b5(mdo sde): byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po longs nyal te ci bya/ de nas rgyal po sad de/ 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis
140b6(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /da bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen
140b7(mdo sde): po phyung la bdag gi phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal
141a1(mdo sde): pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas/ bcom ldan
141a2(mdo sde): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes
141a3(mdo sde): nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges shas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni
141a4(mdo sde): lha'i nang du skyes so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par byas te/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i
141a5(mdo sde): nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/
141a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
141a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
141b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
141b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas
141b3(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de
141b4(mdo sde): zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing / blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so/ /de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas de
141b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du brgyud de bskor nas/ bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dag
141b6(mdo sde): gi tshe yang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/ /bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos
141b7(mdo sde): nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do/ /de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis/ sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du
142a1(mdo sde): skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag
142a2(mdo sde): lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/
142a3(mdo sde): nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
142a4(mdo sde): tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs
142a5(mdo sde): su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i
142a6(mdo sde): tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni
142a7(mdo sde): bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang
142b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni
142b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/
142b3(mdo sde): btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams
142b4(mdo sde): cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong
142b5(mdo sde): nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags
142b6(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas/ de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/
142b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa
143a1(mdo sde): dang mi 'thun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang par bzhag ste kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo/ kyi hud bu gcig zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar bcugs kyang bslang ma nus nas de khwa dang / chun lag dang / bya rgod dang wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ /bud med
143a2(mdo sde): skra bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs/ skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go/ /de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas snying rjes snying bskyod de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug
143a3(mdo sde): go/ /de nas bram ze des drang srong de la dris pa/ kye'i drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ nga ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis
143a4(mdo sde): ni mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la yang zhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun du dka' thub spyad byas te/ /dka' thub mchog ni spyad byas kyang / /gnas de khyod kyis re mi 'thob/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ khyod kyang
143a5(mdo sde): shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu mnam zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun du ngu ba'i las byas kyang / /bu de khyod kyis re mi thob/ /khyod
143a6(mdo sde): ni ngus kyang ci la phan/ /de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /de nas drang srong gis cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste/ pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin
143a7(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so/ /yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang / khyed kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar gyur kyang
143b1(mdo sde): srid do/ /de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
143b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /des mtho bar 'gyur ba thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
143b3(mdo sde): 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
143b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pha gsad pa la thug pa la lan gsum skyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid
143b5(mdo sde): la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'grang ba zhig go/ /de nas re zhig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas/ rgyal
143b6(mdo sde): pos gshed ma rnams la sod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram
143b7(mdo sde): ze 'di yin no/ /byi ba byed pa'i bu gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pha dang bu gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
144a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la de gnyis ka dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang chos thams cad bdag
144a2(mdo sde): med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang
144a3(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sA la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
144a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/
144a5(mdo sde): ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ /na
144a6(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
144a7(mdo sde): so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas shing sa la'i ma tog blangs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sa la'i me tog blangs te/
144b1(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
144b2(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba
144b3(mdo sde): skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sa la'i me tog gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang / re zhig na de sa la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las lhung ste shi nas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen
144b4(mdo sde): bkur byas nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so/ /de nas re zhig na lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na
144b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
144b6(mdo sde): ci phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ las rnams gang gi
144b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas/ /sA la'i me tog rdul med pa/ /bzang po dag gis legs par gtor/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /
145a1(mdo sde): bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes/ /bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing / /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis
145a2(mdo sde): sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de
145a3(mdo sde): la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang
145a4(mdo sde): por skyes pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom
145a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la
145a6(mdo sde): sogs pas byugs pa de/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sa la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid de dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i
145a7(mdo sde): phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/
145b1(mdo sde): de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya
145b2(mdo sde): mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang
145b3(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song
145b4(mdo sde): lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya
145b5(mdo sde): mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal
145b6(mdo sde): 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'
145b7(mdo sde): bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de
146a1(mdo sde): dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
146a2(mdo sde): pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir
146a3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la
146a4(mdo sde): chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
146a5(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang
146a6(mdo sde): po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po bcu gsum pa/ dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
146a7(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
146b1(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang
146b2(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can
146b3(mdo sde): snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med
146b4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba
146b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs
146b6(mdo sde): dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan
146b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs na/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar ci gnang / 'on kyang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos
