147a1(mdo sde): dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
147a2(mdo sde): bdag la dbu skra dang sen mo stsal du gsol/ 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs
147a3(mdo sde): can snying po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsros nas/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog
147a4(mdo sde): dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis rbad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas
147a5(mdo sde): rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad da/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bcas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshes lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i
147a6(mdo sde): dus la bab pa de'i tshe dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa'am/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dbul ba med do/ /de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong / rgyal po
147a7(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po yang dran nas/ snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so zhes 'dzer to/ /de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsdos te/ sangs rgyas
147b1(mdo sde): kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ mar me'i phreng ba dngar to/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re zhig
147b2(mdo sde): na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar ba lags so zhes byas so/ /de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/ de na re bdag gis khyod kyis bka' bcag tu lags
147b3(mdo sde): kyang bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro/ /de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
147b4(mdo sde): skyes so/ /de'i tshe lha mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang
147b5(mdo sde): lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog
147b6(mdo sde): pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ /lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig po/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas
147b7(mdo sde): mthong / /smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la/ /mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon tu phul/ /zla ba'i 'od zer mdog dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa skyes/ /'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis/ /ston pa smra ba'i mchog la
148a1(mdo sde): phyag kyang bgyis/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni lhag par mngon tu mdzes/ /bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing / /nyes pa
148a2(mdo sde): thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i
148a3(mdo sde): 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes
148a4(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom
148a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma
148a6(mdo sde): dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
148a7(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas
148b1(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho
148b2(mdo sde): bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma
148b3(mdo sde): bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan
148b4(mdo sde): pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /
148b5(mdo sde): bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras
148b6(mdo sde): bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma/ tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /
148b7(mdo sde): zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / /nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras
149a1(mdo sde): mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci
149a2(mdo sde): lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i
149a3(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang bsdos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i
149a4(mdo sde): mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ deng mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa
149a5(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ /ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ /bla mar byas/ /ri mor byas/ /mchod pa byas nas
149a6(mdo sde): brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gos zhes bya ba ni/
149a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
149b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
149b2(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
149b3(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/
149b4(mdo sde): mthar gyis gser srang bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe de'i blo skyes pa ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis/ bdag gis skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan
149b5(mdo sde): du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la yang phan gdags par gyur la/ bsod nams mang po yang bskyed par
149b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de/ rgyal po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig /
149b7(mdo sde): deng nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te/ dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de
150a1(mdo sde): nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni
150a2(mdo sde): mgul gyi se mo do sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gdu bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyi phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin
150a3(mdo sde): par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do/ /khyim bdag de yang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na bud med shin tu dbul mo zhig gis sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug
150a4(mdo sde): cig rnyed nas des ras de gyon te srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga zlum brdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ongs pa mthong nas des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa ji ste/ khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter sa'i
150a5(mdo sde): 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir te gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag
150a6(mdo sde): gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du 'jug go zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la/ bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
150a7(mdo sde): bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthu bdag la med kyis/ bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ /des bsams pa gal te bdag 'di
150b1(mdo sde): na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gis bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo/ /de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang
150b2(mdo sde): thog nas bor ba las na/ 'di la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang re zhig na bu mo de tsog tsog por 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis
150b3(mdo sde): dris pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste bdag gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas de dag gis khyim bdag
150b4(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin la byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to/ /de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu
150b5(mdo sde): dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la yang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo / /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi
150b6(mdo sde): 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che
150b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal
151a1(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam
151a2(mdo sde): pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom
151a3(mdo sde): nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams
151a4(mdo sde): bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen
151a5(mdo sde): gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ /dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams
151a6(mdo sde): rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /
151a7(mdo sde): mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /
151b1(mdo sde): dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar
151b2(mdo sde): ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /
151b3(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom
151b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud
151b5(mdo sde): par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
151b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya'i bkur sti med par mi bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
151b7(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
152a1(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
152a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
152a3(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /
152a4(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang
152a5(mdo sde): dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid
152a6(mdo sde): che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos
152a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po
152b1(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am mi gzigs pa'am mi rtogs pa'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la
152b2(mdo sde): phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul
152b3(mdo sde): ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ /chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i
152b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnams par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi
152b5(mdo sde): me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ /stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad
152b6(mdo sde): par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang
152b7(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i
153a1(mdo sde): nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par
153a2(mdo sde): grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can
153a3(mdo sde): snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig
153a4(mdo sde): gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas shin tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/ /bdag la phan gdags su
153a5(mdo sde): gsol/ nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne tso gnas pa de'i drung du rtswa'i gdan bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po rnams
153a6(mdo sde): ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do/ /de nas ne tsos bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ sam gcan gzan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun skor
153a7(mdo sde): bar byed do/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis na bzod pa
153b1(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ /de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas re zhig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du
153b2(mdo sde): chas te mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang steng na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod
153b3(mdo sde): cig / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/ lha khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang steng nas babs te/ blon po chen po'i
153b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan
153b5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so/ /de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du
153b6(mdo sde): rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /
153b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang
154a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das
154a2(mdo sde): la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas
154a3(mdo sde): byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor
154a4(mdo sde): te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
154a5(mdo sde): nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang
154a6(mdo sde): mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal
154a7(mdo sde): pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i
154b1(mdo sde): ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug
154b2(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang
154b3(mdo sde): ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'
154b4(mdo sde): bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de
154b5(mdo sde): dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i
154b6(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir
154b7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ne tso de nyid
155a1(mdo sde): shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa de yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des ne tsor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa
155a2(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las
155a3(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi
155a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /
155a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
155a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na de na dge
155a7(mdo sde): bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las
155b1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar
155b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
155b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pho nya zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang / pho
155b4(mdo sde): brang 'khor kyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
155b5(mdo sde): bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
155b6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar gnas par
155b7(mdo sde): dam bcas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig /sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag
156a1(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras
156a2(mdo sde): pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bzhes so zhes thos lags so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po
156a3(mdo sde): gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi dang blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyar bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la/ der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
156a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshol la/ bdag cag gi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/
156a5(mdo sde): 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal
156a6(mdo sde): bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / blon
156a7(mdo sde): po dang / pho brang 'khor kyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/ mthar gyis song song ba las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
156b1(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kyi mi
156b2(mdo sde): rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas
156b3(mdo sde): sam zhes mchi'o/ /'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom
156b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan
156b5(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la
156b6(mdo sde): cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas zhabs 'bring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te gshegs so/ /
156b7(mdo sde): pho nya yang shing rta la zhon te chas so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thugs brtse ba'i slad
157a1(mdo sde): du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang / /yang dag stsol la nga gnas nas/ /nyon mongs tsher mas ma snad par/ /sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed/ /pho nyas gsol
157a2(mdo sde): pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang / bdag la phan gdags pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so/ /
157a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to/ /de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan
157a4(mdo sde): mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do/ /pho nya de ni tshe thung ste chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa
157a5(mdo sde): gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /
157a6(mdo sde): de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur
157a7(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa/ des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i
157b1(mdo sde): me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
157b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas
157b3(mdo sde): sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang /
157b4(mdo sde): mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal
157b5(mdo sde): pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i
157b6(mdo sde): ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni
157b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas
158a1(mdo sde): do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa
158a2(mdo sde): 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang
158a3(mdo sde): steng na 'dug pas snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta
158a4(mdo sde): ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/ khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar
158a5(mdo sde): gyur nas shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas rgyal po de ngo mtshar du gyur nas kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos kye ma dge 'dun
158a6(mdo sde): 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
158a7(mdo sde): stan las langs te song ngo / /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags pa dang / dge
158b1(mdo sde): 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du
158b2(mdo sde): shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/ /sangs
158b3(mdo sde): rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar
158b4(mdo sde): shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par ston to/ /chos la
158b5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya
158b6(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na tshogs sam/ 'dus pa'am/ mang po'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan te/
158b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba'
159a1(mdo sde): zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang
159a2(mdo sde): po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
159a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/
159a4(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha
159a5(mdo sde): dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ma he'i khyu chen po dang ma he rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do/ /de nas re
159a6(mdo sde): zhig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/ /de nas ma he rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
159a7(mdo sde): bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis skad cher bos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par shes
159b1(mdo sde): kyis khyed snying ma chung shig / de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring mo zhig nas mthong ba dang rnga ma ldang du gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul te/
159b2(mdo sde): glo g.yas g.yon du mi chen po lnga sprul to/ /steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to/ /de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas zhum pa'i
159b3(mdo sde): bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la/ des brda phrad pa'i skad du bzhin 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum
159b4(mdo sde): bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thos nas ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar yod/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/ /don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /
159b5(mdo sde): 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/ /'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la dmad de kha 'tshos nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags
159b6(mdo sde): rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skyen par shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam
159b7(mdo sde): mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan
160a1(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos
160a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-ika la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man
160a3(mdo sde): dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i
160a4(mdo sde): bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom
160a5(mdo sde): nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho
160a6(mdo sde): ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
160a7(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan
160b1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /
160b2(mdo sde): skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig
160b3(mdo sde): rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa
160b4(mdo sde): de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis
160b5(mdo sde): te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te/
160b6(mdo sde): bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur na bdag
160b7(mdo sde): cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas
161a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma
161a2(mdo sde): her skyes lags las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/ las gang bgyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom
161a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing
161a4(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
161a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la
161a6(mdo sde): bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
161a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs
161b1(mdo sde): so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go/ /de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de dag sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/ des
161b2(mdo sde): ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung ste/ nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so/ /de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
161b3(mdo sde): dag ji snyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no/ /slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so/ /slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to/ /nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa des
161b4(mdo sde): ni lhar skyes so/ /dge slong gi dngos po thob ste tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang dgra bcom nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar
161b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
161b6(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / //bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
161b7(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
162a1(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
162a2(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba
162a3(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ de chos mnyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
162a4(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
162a5(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i
162a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma
162a7(mdo sde): bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /
162b1(mdo sde): shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /
162b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs
162b3(mdo sde): gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad
162b4(mdo sde): las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong
162b5(mdo sde): ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad
162b6(mdo sde): du mchis lags sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ /lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga
162b7(mdo sde): la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ ming
163a1(mdo sde): ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas
163a2(mdo sde): bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
163a3(mdo sde): skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /phyis re zhig na rgyal po kr-i kI bcom ldan
163a4(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de nas re zhig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po de rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/
163a5(mdo sde): de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/ des ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so/ /dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par
163a6(mdo sde): bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so/ /de na gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de
163a7(mdo sde): nas shi nas rgyal po kr-i kI'i bur skyes te de'i bu'i ming legs skyes zhes btags nas pha shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go/ /cig shos kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshan bab ste
163b1(mdo sde): des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo/ /de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang
163b2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/ gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan
163b3(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrung bar bya'o/ /'on kyang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du 'ongs te phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig /sku tshe ring bar shog cig
163b4(mdo sde): ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa stsal du gsol/ gal te ma stsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas de
163b5(mdo sde): nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste/ mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/ su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan
163b6(mdo sde): pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no/ /bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas re zhig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des/ rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang / bdug pa dang /
163b7(mdo sde): me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na/ 'od phyung ste gzigs shig ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang / de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan
164a1(mdo sde): pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam la bris pa zhig rnyed do/ /de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin to/ /drang srong smra ba na gnas
164a2(mdo sde): pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so/ /klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la phyung ste lus bor nas de kha 'tshos te 'dug go/ /de nas de shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya
164a3(mdo sde): dang bcas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
164a4(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
164a5(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma
164a6(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
164a7(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas
164b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang
164b2(mdo sde): dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /phyis re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / pany+tsa la'i
164b3(mdo sde): rgyal pos/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du
164b4(mdo sde): btang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma byin te/ de dag gis
164b5(mdo sde): zos nas tshim zhing mgu la dbang po brtas te 'khod do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste chos nyan par byed do/ /de nas de dag tshe thung ste/
164b6(mdo sde): shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas ngang pa las shi 'phos
164b7(mdo sde): pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i
165a1(mdo sde): phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin
165a2(mdo sde): po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis
165a3(mdo sde): thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi
165a4(mdo sde): bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
165a5(mdo sde): rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song
165a6(mdo sde): gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang mi'i nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi
165a7(mdo sde): tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan
165b1(mdo sde): mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob/ /bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi
165b2(mdo sde): mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra
165b3(mdo sde): thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa
165b4(mdo sde): gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong
165b5(mdo sde): bas kyang the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta
165b6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
165b7(mdo sde): rgyal gyis/ ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang sum nga'i thad du lhags nas de dag la
166a1(mdo sde): ngas chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag
166a2(mdo sde): bgyis na des ngang par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
166a3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa
166a4(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched
166a5(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang
166a6(mdo sde): po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
166a7(mdo sde): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des ni ngang par skyes so/ /nga la
166b1(mdo sde): sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las
166b2(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs
166b3(mdo sde): la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
166b4(mdo sde): bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang / /byad bzang stobs ldan sdu gu dang / /pad ma mig dang rnga sgra dang / /bu dang nyi ma gyad pa
166b5(mdo sde): dang / /gser 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
166b6(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
166b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
167a1(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
167a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu
167a3(mdo sde): lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas
167a4(mdo sde): so/ /de nas pha ma dang sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ni ga las 'ongs zhig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u
167a5(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u gser
167a6(mdo sde): 'od pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan
167a7(mdo sde): yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/
167b1(mdo sde): snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /phyis re zhig na/ de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go/ /shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo / /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas
167b2(mdo sde): dris pa khyod gar 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o/ /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas
167b3(mdo sde): te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas de yang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
167b4(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
167b5(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des chos de thos pa dang
167b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
