167b7(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas
168a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig /de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs
168a2(mdo sde): nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs lus
168a3(mdo sde): la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad
168a4(mdo sde): pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
168a5(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar
168a6(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang
168a7(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rab tu
168b1(mdo sde): byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de
168b2(mdo sde): dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
168b3(mdo sde): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can
168b4(mdo sde): dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
168b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba
168b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med
168b7(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
169a1(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long
169a2(mdo sde): zhig lhung ba des mthong nas/ des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas/ mchod rten de la btags te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par
169a3(mdo sde): gyur cig / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u
169a4(mdo sde): gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /
169a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las
169a6(mdo sde): 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod
169a7(mdo sde): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
169b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
169b2(mdo sde): dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
169b3(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas
169b4(mdo sde): na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des
169b5(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
169b6(mdo sde): la mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags
169b7(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de'i nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u dri zhim pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma
170a1(mdo sde): snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang
170a2(mdo sde): ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che la/ chos
170a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim zhing dpung rgyan dang mgul pa'i do shal dang gdu bus brgyan te srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas mchog tu ya
170a4(mdo sde): mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du/ kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes zer ro/ /phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan
170a5(mdo sde): pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba
170a6(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
170a7(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
170b1(mdo sde): byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad
170b2(mdo sde): snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas
170b3(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i
170b4(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
170b5(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim nyid
170b6(mdo sde): kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong
170b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
171a1(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /
171a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/
171a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs
171a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/
171a5(mdo sde): rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa bskyed nas/
171a6(mdo sde): spos dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /
171a7(mdo sde): ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin
171b1(mdo sde): te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur dri zhim por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag
171b2(mdo sde): de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par
171b3(mdo sde): smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
171b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ byad bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
171b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
171b6(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
171b7(mdo sde): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
172a1(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
172a2(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags
172a3(mdo sde): nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byad dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags
172a4(mdo sde): pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di'i lus dpe med pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas
172a5(mdo sde): khye'u byad bzang pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /
172a6(mdo sde): mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge ba bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can
172a7(mdo sde): bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams
172b1(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing che bar grags so/ /phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
172b2(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
172b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
172b4(mdo sde): te/ de thos nas khye'u byad bzang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
172b5(mdo sde): ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
172b6(mdo sde): can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i
172b7(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang
173a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byad bzang gis las gang
173a2(mdo sde): dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byad bzang nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba'
173a3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na byad bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi
173a4(mdo sde): rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
173a5(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
173a6(mdo sde): pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
173a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
173b1(mdo sde): thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/
173b2(mdo sde): rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring
173b3(mdo sde): byas pas mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so/ /phyis re zhig na nyi ma gcig cig /mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas des de la me tog rnyis pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas des sangs
173b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags me tog rnyis pa yang bsal to/ /de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas/ dga' ba skyes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/
173b5(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom
173b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ byad bzang 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na byad gzugs bzang por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa
173b7(mdo sde): des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa
174a1(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par

174a7(mdo sde): shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma
174b1(mdo sde): la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags
174b2(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u stobs ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
174b3(mdo sde): dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i

174b5(mdo sde): dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'
174b6(mdo sde): ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
174b7(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan
175a1(mdo sde): gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig
175a2(mdo sde): lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
175a3(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang
175a4(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
175a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed
175a6(mdo sde): cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i
175a7(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ lus can dag gi
175b1(mdo sde): las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
175b2(mdo sde): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par
175b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa
175b4(mdo sde): byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to/ /phyis re zhig na khyim
175b5(mdo sde): bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang des mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi lde gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu
175b6(mdo sde): dag thob par gyur cig / ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan
175b7(mdo sde): 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /
176a1(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu
176a2(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sdu gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
176a3(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
176a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
176a5(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
176a6(mdo sde): kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u
176a7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ che bar grags pa mthong na dga' ba zhig btsas te de btsas pa na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma
176b1(mdo sde): thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sdu gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u sdu gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang /
176b2(mdo sde): mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/
176b3(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do/ /de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u sdu gu shing n+ya gro d+hA'i
176b4(mdo sde): kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun
176b5(mdo sde): nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
176b6(mdo sde): khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sdu gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas
176b7(mdo sde): pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
177a1(mdo sde): yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur
177a2(mdo sde): pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom
177a3(mdo sde): skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sdu gus las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
177a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag sdu gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sdu gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
177a5(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par
177a6(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
177a7(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na
177b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku
177b2(mdo sde): gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba na/ khyim bdag
177b3(mdo sde): gcig gis rgyal po la gsol pa/ bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas khyim bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/
177b4(mdo sde): me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog btags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba skyes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du
177b5(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdu gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des na/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyur gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
177b6(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar
177b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/
178a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pad ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
178a2(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
178a3(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
178a4(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
178a5(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
178a6(mdo sde): la mdzes pa mig pad ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji
178a7(mdo sde): skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di mig pad ma dang 'dra bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u pad ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru
178b1(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du
178b2(mdo sde): skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/
178b3(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
178b4(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba
178b5(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
178b6(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas te des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang
178b7(mdo sde): rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i
179a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa
179a2(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/
179a3(mdo sde): rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na de bsod snyoms
179a4(mdo sde): la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo mtshar bar gyur to/ /de nas pad ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
179a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na nor bu rin po che med par bya mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyis ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /
179a6(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
179a7(mdo sde): pad ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar
179b1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams
179b2(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
179b3(mdo sde): dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
179b4(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me
179b5(mdo sde): bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
179b6(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na/ ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des de'i nang nas
179b7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs dang
180a1(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i mdog lta bur 'dug par byas so/ /me tog pad ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig
180a2(mdo sde): mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad ma'i mig 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la nor bu
180a3(mdo sde): rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo / /pad ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/ mig pad ma sngon po lta bur gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong
180a4(mdo sde): dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren
180a5(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
180a6(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
180a7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/
180b1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
180b2(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa/ yangs shing
180b3(mdo sde): rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/
180b4(mdo sde): de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa/ bya ka la ping ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming
180b5(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u rnga sgra pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma
180b6(mdo sde): gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing
180b7(mdo sde): bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun
181a1(mdo sde): dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo
181a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa
181a3(mdo sde): dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
181a4(mdo sde): sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas
181a5(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
181a6(mdo sde): te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes
181a7(mdo sde): pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa
181b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
181b2(mdo sde): dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams
181b3(mdo sde): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par
181b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
181b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na
181b6(mdo sde): rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po
181b7(mdo sde): gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti
182a1(mdo sde): byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de nas re zhig na khyim bdag cig gis rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang mi las rol mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul nas de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bkur sti
182a2(mdo sde): byed do/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na
182a3(mdo sde): da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren
182a4(mdo sde): ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ bcom ldan
182a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
182a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/
182a7(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
182b1(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi
182b2(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te bu btsas na sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma
182b3(mdo sde): dang khyim de na gnas pa gzhan dag dang g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to/ de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste 'di ci yin/ su la bsnyad
182b4(mdo sde): par bya/ shes pa su yod snyam mo de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
182b5(mdo sde): la zhus so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig /sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rmel ba'i nang du chug la zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig kyang dus gsum gsum du lag pas brims te/ 'o mas kyang yang dang yang du gtor cig dang
182b6(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la de dag thams cad tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bsams pa bdag gi bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas des de
182b7(mdo sde): bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /de nas re zhig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrings
183a1(mdo sde): nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
183a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ dga' ba bskyed
183a3(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba
183a4(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /
183a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
183a6(mdo sde): spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
183a7(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang sa so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/
183b1(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gzhon nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu
183b2(mdo sde): tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi
183b3(mdo sde): rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /
183b4(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
183b5(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/
183b6(mdo sde): re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan
183b7(mdo sde): 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
184a1(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na mdza' sde bo brgya phyi rol tu byung ba dang de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang me tog phreng dang mar me dbul ba dag gis kyang
184a2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas nas lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto gcig kho na nas 'byung bar gyur cig /tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang yang dag par
184a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshan po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten de la bkur sti
184a4(mdo sde): byas pa des na 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu
184a5(mdo sde): nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren
184a6(mdo sde): ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
184a7(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po bcu drug pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
184b1(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
184b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
184b3(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/
184b4(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ de rtsa zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u
184b5(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so/ /de nas pha
184b6(mdo sde): ma dang khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang nye du rnams dang ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas/ ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
184b7(mdo sde): byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u nyi ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
185a1(mdo sde): dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma
185a2(mdo sde): bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par
185a3(mdo sde): dga' ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de nas phyis re zhig na/ khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas
185a4(mdo sde): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
185a5(mdo sde): te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas/ khye'u nyi mas 'jig
185a6(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha
185a7(mdo sde): ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig
185b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan
185b2(mdo sde): sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus
185b3(mdo sde): par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la lkog 'phyas byed de/ de 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag
185b4(mdo sde): tu 'khyam pa las na/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
185b5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na med par byar mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni
185b6(mdo sde): mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar
185b7(mdo sde): grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ nyi ma nyid kyis las byas
186a1(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/
186a2(mdo sde): las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge
186a3(mdo sde): slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
186a4(mdo sde): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i
186a5(mdo sde): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags
186a6(mdo sde): gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnam pa sna
186a7(mdo sde): tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po dang rgyan pos rtses nas skugs su nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/ /de nas de dad pa bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi
186b1(mdo sde): tshar khab la btags te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed
186b2(mdo sde): par ma gyur cig / nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na cho lo la dor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das
186b3(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che btags pa des na/ 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges
186b4(mdo sde): par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las
186b5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
186b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
186b7(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
187a1(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
187a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig
187a3(mdo sde): gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
187a4(mdo sde): mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgrengs so/ /lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdungs so/ /lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma
187a5(mdo sde): dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ /khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgrengs so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re
187a6(mdo sde): khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad na grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis
187a7(mdo sde): te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang
187b1(mdo sde): ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
187b2(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga'
187b3(mdo sde): ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de
187b4(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de thos nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing
187b5(mdo sde): phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang /
187b6(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil
187b7(mdo sde): du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
188a1(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de yang gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i gos spyod de/ gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung du spyod do/ /gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong spyod de/
188a2(mdo sde): gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung du spyod do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgrengs nas/
188a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung
188a4(mdo sde): la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par
