188a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi
188a6(mdo sde): las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
188a7(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing
188b1(mdo sde): bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen
188b2(mdo sde): yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas
188b3(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyis ba dan dag sgreng ngo / /de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang /
188b4(mdo sde): des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas des de blangs te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de
188b5(mdo sde): mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/
188b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge
188b7(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /
189a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
189a2(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ 'od
189a3(mdo sde): bzang ma dang rab sdug ma/ /dkar mo zla ba ud pa la/ /mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang / /ka tsang ga la ba de byed ma/ /mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan/ /'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
189a4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo
189a5(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha
189a6(mdo sde): dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang
189a7(mdo sde): la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
189b1(mdo sde): spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis bklubs pa nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa zhig btsas te/ de las 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de
189b2(mdo sde): nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes
189b3(mdo sde): zer ro/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying
189b4(mdo sde): khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su dang su 'ongs
189b5(mdo sde): kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do/ /byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas
189b6(mdo sde): de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud pa mthong nas/ smras pa/
189b7(mdo sde): yab ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ de nas des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo de na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal
190a1(mdo sde): la gsol nas mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/ de ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis khyed kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon ta chos gos tshon
190a2(mdo sde): can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so/ /de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna
190a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho nar bas so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas de dag
190a4(mdo sde): phyir log go/ /bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
190a5(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas mngon
190a6(mdo sde): par shes pa yang bsgrubs so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
190a7(mdo sde): bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba
190b1(mdo sde): mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/
190b2(mdo sde): 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar byas so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bsnyags pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu
190b3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sru mar spyon mar spyon khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag
190b4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma nam mkha' las babs nas skye bo phal po che'i gung la 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de nas
190b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil
190b6(mdo sde): ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/
190b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye
191a1(mdo sde): dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des
191a2(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul pa nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
191a3(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/
191a4(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par
191a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
191a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen
191a7(mdo sde): ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas
191b1(mdo sde): rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po
191b2(mdo sde): gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te mchod rten de la phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang dgra bcom
191b3(mdo sde): pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten
191b4(mdo sde): la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des na gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag
191b5(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na
191b6(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs
191b7(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
192a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
192a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
192a3(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung
192a4(mdo sde): ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming
192a5(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de yang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung / /zhing gi khyad
192a6(mdo sde): par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/ dad pas lha mi dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin/ /de nas de'i pha ma dang gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing dngangs te mi dga' bar gyur la/ skyi bung zhes byas
192a7(mdo sde): nas smras pa kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go/ /des smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bu mo lags te sbyin pa dag sbyin par 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo de 'di skad mchi'o/ /
192b1(mdo sde): zhes bsnyad do/ /de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs gdon du bcug go/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa
192b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phongs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /re zhig na de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ der
192b3(mdo sde): srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba med pas shi'o/ /de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma la nga na re 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang /
192b4(mdo sde): mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du song nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang /
192b5(mdo sde): stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so/ /de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so/ /de nas re zhig
192b6(mdo sde): na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rab sdug ma gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so/ /mgon med zas sbyin
192b7(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis khyod kyis bya mi dgos so/ /rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te yab bden pa mthong ba lags la sa'i 'og thog dag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/ sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/
193a1(mdo sde): 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang 'dzin
193a2(mdo sde): gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so/ /de nas nags khung du song nas der mi ma yin pa mi'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o/ /de ltar skabs phye nas kyang / des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
193a3(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i
193a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/
193a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang
193a6(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos
193a7(mdo sde): gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so/ /de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas 'o brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to/ /
193b1(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas dro la bab na rgyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to/ /de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams dag
193b2(mdo sde): gi rnam par smin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas lhas lha'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo / /de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung
193b3(mdo sde): bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste dge slong ma rab sdug ma 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/
193b4(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
193b5(mdo sde): sum bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab
193b6(mdo sde): sdug ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam
193b7(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab
194a1(mdo sde): pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
194a2(mdo sde): pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
194a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te skyed mos
194a4(mdo sde): tshal du song nas bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang khyer ro/ /de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te jo bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag gzhug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas
194a5(mdo sde): de dga' bar gyur te bla skyes pa/ bdag la jo bos lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang bsdos nas 'bras chan gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das
194a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / re zhig na tshong dpon gyis bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb de ga re zhes dris so/ /des smras pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs
194a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas smras pa bu mo khyod deng phyin cad bran mo las phyung gis song shig /khyod kyis bdag gnyid kyis log pa na
194b1(mdo sde): mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes smras so/ /de nas des thal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de jo bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang chos
194b2(mdo sde): gos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la lo dgu stong gi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byas te/ 'bras chan dang / skyo ma dang / thug pa btung ba dang / rtag res 'khor dang / mgron du bod pa dang / mar me'i phreng
194b3(mdo sde): ba dang / chos gos sra brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos
194b4(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag gzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug
194b5(mdo sde): ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong
194b6(mdo sde): dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur
194b7(mdo sde): ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
195a1(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi
195a2(mdo sde): mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri
195a3(mdo sde): mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
195a4(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya snar ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/
195a5(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
195a6(mdo sde): spyad kyang / bu yang med bu mo yang med de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bsams pa bdag gis khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar
195a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/ /de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pas gu lang dang / chu lha
195b1(mdo sde): dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma
195b2(mdo sde): len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/
195b3(mdo sde): gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma 'dod chags
195b4(mdo sde): langs te/ phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi
195b5(mdo sde): 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas des khyim thab la sbran to/ /de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtong ngo / /de nas re zhig na de zla ba brgyad
195b6(mdo sde): dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa gos dkar po gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas re zhig na shAkya snar mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste bu mo
195b7(mdo sde): zhig btsas sa zhes thos pa dang de khros te nang du song ngo / /de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo/ /de nas shAkya snar mas bu mo mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed
196a1(mdo sde): de/ nye du rnams na re 'di gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo dkar mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse
196a2(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /bu mo dkar mo
196a3(mdo sde): ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste dri ma can du yang mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du
196a4(mdo sde): 'ong ngo / /de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa
196a5(mdo sde): mthong nas/ smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ de nas des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/
196a6(mdo sde): yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas re zhig na des pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to/ /de nas des brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bad pas
196a7(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
196b1(mdo sde): du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang
196b2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom
196b3(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang gos dkar po gyon pa dang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis
196b4(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dkar mo nyid kyis las byas
196b5(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
196b6(mdo sde): dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /
196b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang
197a1(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig
197a2(mdo sde): 'dug pa drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/
197a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das
197a4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo/ /de nas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
197a5(mdo sde): na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas so/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /
197a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren
197a7(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
197b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams
197b2(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
197b3(mdo sde): lta 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
197b4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod
197b5(mdo sde): pa na bram ze phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de yang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnam grangs dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang
197b6(mdo sde): yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang lnga pa ste gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brda sprod nus pa zhig go/ /de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do/ /de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu
197b7(mdo sde): rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas
198a1(mdo sde): de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ /nye du rnams na re bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo zla ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma
198a2(mdo sde): gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis
198a3(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bya ba la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na de'i pha bram
198a4(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u rnams la sngags slob pa na des thos pa tsam gyis lobs so/ /thos nas kyang bstan bcos de dag ltag 'og sbyor zhing 'chad nus so/ /de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/ /mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs
198a5(mdo sde): te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe mnyan du yod par gshegs nas/ mkhas pa rnams dang mkhas par bgrang ba de dag
198a6(mdo sde): phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der 'dong bar byed do/ /de nas de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa kye ci'i phyir de bstan bcos shes pa dag mi 'ong / 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs
198a7(mdo sde): te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
198b1(mdo sde): 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu
198b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
198b3(mdo sde): chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang
198b4(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom
198b5(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
198b6(mdo sde): dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
198b7(mdo sde): rnams la/ dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa/ /de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor
199a1(mdo sde): thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong ma la tshig re re nas chos kyi lung dbog par mi mdzad de/ gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga'
199a2(mdo sde): zhig yod na ni ngas lung dbog go/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lan cig
199a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pas bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dbog pa mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' stsal pas dge
199a4(mdo sde): slong ma zla bas lobs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad
199a5(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing bsags pa des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
199a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge
199a7(mdo sde): slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams
199b1(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri
199b2(mdo sde): thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
199b3(mdo sde): khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des de la lung mnos te bslabs nas kha ton tu byas te phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la
199b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par byung ba la mkhas pa dang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas so/ /mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyed ma nus so/ /de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de nas
199b5(mdo sde): dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gis mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin
199b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig ces byas so/ /
199b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te des smon lam btab pa des na thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /des der lung mnos te/ bslabs nas kha ton du byas pa
200a1(mdo sde): des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar
200a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par
200a3(mdo sde): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ud pa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
200a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
200a5(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
200a6(mdo sde): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang yid 'ong gnyis phrad pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der grong
200a7(mdo sde): khyer chen po drug po thams cad nas skye bo mang po 'du'o/ /de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs pa de'i bu mo ud pa la zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ lang tsho dang nad med pa'i rgyags pas
200b1(mdo sde): dregs pa zhig yod de/ de gang gi tshe ltad mo ba'i nang du 'ong ba de'i tshe/ ltad mo ba thams cad kyis yid smon byed cing lta bar byed de/ gang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag gi'ang yid 'phrog par byed do/ /der gang gi tshe dus ston byung ba de'i tshe rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug kyang
200b2(mdo sde): 'ong ngo / /de nas bu mo ud pa las skye bo mang po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na mir gyur pa'i nang na bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam pa'am/ khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod do/ /
200b3(mdo sde): ud pa las smras pa/ ci de mi yin nam 'on te lha yin/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/ mi ni yin mod kyi/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no/ /de nas tshig de thos nas ud pa la rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /song nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
200b4(mdo sde): ste/ gar byed cing glu len la rol mo byed do/ /bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rtags rnams dang / bud med kyi brda rnams dang / bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/ /der dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni des ci bya gtol med par
200b5(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba'i rnams gdul ba dang ud pa la'i byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis ud pa la rgas shing 'khogs pa la mgo skya ba dang so rto zhing phyam dgu bo ltar
200b6(mdo sde): sgur bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas de ltar sprul pa'i mod la ud pa las bdag nyid mi sdug par mthong nas byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa de med par gyur to/ /dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams kyang skyo bar gyur to/ /de nas ud pa la
200b7(mdo sde): rgyags pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas rnag can gyi lus 'di las tshegs chung ngus yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom
201a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
201a2(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad
201a3(mdo sde): spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /ud pa la yang dad pa rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil
201a4(mdo sde): ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam
201a5(mdo sde): pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang /
201a6(mdo sde): dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /zlos gar mkhan de dag gis kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom
201a7(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zlos gar mkhan gyi bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa las rga bas skyo bar mdzad nas/ gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag tu bzhag pa ni ngo mtshar
201b1(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde
201b2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe/ bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang / lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs pa las rga bas skyo bar byas nas/ gzha' gsang gi
201b3(mdo sde): mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
201b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ngas bu mo ud pa la rga bas skyo bar byas nas/ brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
201b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang /
201b6(mdo sde): mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
201b7(mdo sde): spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba/ gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i
202a1(mdo sde): dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de nye du rnams na re 'di'i yab yul ka shi'i
202a2(mdo sde): rgyal po yin la/ 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u ka shi mdzes ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
202a3(mdo sde): rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang
202a4(mdo sde): gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/ /de nas des rgyal po byed pa na/ nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo / /de yang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te/ 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chus
202a5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing kyi g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon la me'i sbyin sreg byed do/ /phyis re zhig na 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig tu song ba dang / re zhig na der mi 'am ci'i bu mo zhig gis drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas chags par gyur te/ gar byed cing glu len la rol mo byed do/ /
202a6(mdo sde): bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rtags rnams dang / bud med kyi brda rnams dang / bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na drang srong ka shi mdzes ldan gyis bu mo de la chos bshad de che zhe khyod rgas te/ khyod kyi nga ro dang po ni snyan cing mnyen la mjug ni ra ra
202a7(mdo sde): por gyur to zhes byas so/ /de nas des chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur to/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/ gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
202b1(mdo sde): ba de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi slob mar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ud pa la 'di nyid yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
202b2(mdo sde): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa btsun pa ud pa las las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ud
202b3(mdo sde): pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ud pa la nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge
202b4(mdo sde): slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
202b5(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe
202b6(mdo sde): lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du
202b7(mdo sde): byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs so/ /der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la bsgo ba/
203a1(mdo sde): nga'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar gyi gar thabs gyis shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis rgyal po de'i bka' spyi bos mnos te/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar sbyar te legs par sbyangs nas/ rgyal po'i blon po'i tshogs dang
203a2(mdo sde): bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar gyi gar thabs byas so/ /de nas der zlos gar mkhan gyi gar gyi slob dpon nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so/ /zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams ni dge slong gi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so/ /de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/
203a3(mdo sde): zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la nor gyi phung po chen po byin no/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems
203a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ zlos gar mkhar gang yin pa de dag ni ud pa la la
203a5(mdo sde): sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
203a6(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la
203a7(mdo sde): gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
203b1(mdo sde): po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci
203b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
203b3(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na
203b4(mdo sde): rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa
203b5(mdo sde): dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing
203b6(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu
203b7(mdo sde): mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di ka shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo yin la byad gzugs kyang bzang bas/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
204a1(mdo sde): dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par
204a2(mdo sde): bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug gis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo btsas zhes bdag gis thos kyis gzhan la
204a3(mdo sde): ma sbyin par bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spring ngo / /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams ni bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas
204a4(mdo sde): re zhig na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te pha'i thad du song ba dang des pha mya ngan gyis non pa mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i slad du mya ngan mdzad/ de nas phas kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan mas pha la smras pa/ yab nyi 'og
204a5(mdo sde): gi rgyal po rnams la da ste zhag bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis/ khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces pho nya gtang du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po de rnams 'dus so/ /bu mo ka shi
204a6(mdo sde): mdzes ldan ma yang shing rta la zhon te chos gos tshon can gyi ba dan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs lag na thogs te rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang du song nas smras pa/ kye nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams gson cig /bdag ni khyed kyi gzugs dang / lang tsho dang /
204a7(mdo sde): rigs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mi sems kyi bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bdag ni ras 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin pa de'i slob ma lags te/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas drang
204b1(mdo sde): srong smra bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag
204b2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /de nas des kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig
204b3(mdo sde): lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
204b4(mdo sde): du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
204b5(mdo sde): dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis de'i gzugs dang /
204b6(mdo sde): lang tsho dang / mdzes pa rjes su dran nas 'dod chags kyi rgyags pas myos te/ rab tu byung bzhin du yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas de dag gis gsol ba btab nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ cho 'phrul rnam
204b7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba mthong nas spu zing zhes byed de/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol te/ sru khyod kyis chos
205a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid kyis bzod par mdzod cig ces byas so/ /de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma nam mkha' las babs te/ skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug nas chos de lta bu dag bstan te/ de thos
205a2(mdo sde): nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob bo/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ka shi mdzes ldan mas las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rab tu
205a3(mdo sde): byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ka shi mdzes ldan ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
205a4(mdo sde): shing bsags pas na/ ka shi mdzes ldan ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
205a5(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar
205a6(mdo sde): yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
205a7(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i bu mo de dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing
205b1(mdo sde): bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsig tu bcug ste/ yo byad thams cad kyis gang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la yang rab tu byung nas
205b2(mdo sde): lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka shi mdzes ldan ma 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang phul ba des ni gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
205b3(mdo sde): gi ring la rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar
205b4(mdo sde): ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
205b5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mu tig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
205b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang /
205b7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
206a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon
206a2(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon rgyal ba zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des
206a3(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes
206a4(mdo sde): pa mgo bo la mu tig gi phreng ba btags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu mgo bo la mu tig gi phreng ba byung bas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming
206a5(mdo sde): mu tig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo mu tig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang /
206a6(mdo sde): zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na bu mo mu tig mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de'i mu tig gi phreng ba de phog na phyir zhing byung bar gyur
206a7(mdo sde): to/ /de nas bu mo des bkren pa dang phongs pa rnams mthong nas longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe bag mar gtang ran par gyur pa dang / rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po rnams de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de'i pha mya ngan
206b1(mdo sde): gyi khang bur zhugs nas/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas bu mo des pha la gsol pa yab ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ de nas des ji ltar gyur pa
206b2(mdo sde): thams cad bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mos smras pa/ yab bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu tha rab sdug ces bya ba des pha la gsol pa/
206b3(mdo sde): bdag gi mchis brang du bu mo de bslang bar gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshong dpon rgyal ba la pho nya btang ste/ bu mo mu tig bdag gi bu la byin cig /de ltar byas pa dang gnyen du yang 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang mdza' bor 'gyur ro zhes
206b4(mdo sde): byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag rgyal gyis bdag gi bu mo la don de bsnyad do/ /des smras pa gal te shed bye ste cher skyes pa na bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar dam bcas na ni bdag gi khyim thab tu bgyi'o zhes byas so/ /de nas des de ltar byas
206b5(mdo sde): nas re zhig na skabs zhig tu gnyi ga khyim nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas de nyid kyis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /
206b6(mdo sde): ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang
206b7(mdo sde): lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang
207a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mu tig gis las gang dag bgyis na/
207a2(mdo sde): des mu tig gi phreng ba mgo bo la thogs bzhin du btsas la rab tu byung nas kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu tig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba'
207a3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mu tig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
207a4(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can
207a5(mdo sde): dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
207a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste de grong khyer
207a7(mdo sde): bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa las nye zho med par gru'i don grub ste phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas des mu tig gi phreng ba mchog tu bzang ba zhig khyer te 'ongs so/ /de'i chung ma yang
207b1(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste des de'i mgo bo la btags so/ /de nas bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig gnas
207b2(mdo sde): pa de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ lo lnga pa'i dus ston bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po kr-i kI la gsol te/ bdag gi dad pa bsdus la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lo lnga pa'i dus ston bgyi bar 'tshal
207b3(mdo sde): lo zhes byas so/ /rgyal pos kyang de ltar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas khyim bdag de glang po che la zhon te/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na lam po che dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu song nas dad pa sdud par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyi chung mas mu tig gi phreng ba
207b4(mdo sde): mgo bo las phog nas dad pa sdud pa la phul lo/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon 'ongs pa dang mu tig gi phreng ba mgo bo las phog par mthong nas/ bzang mo mu tig gi phreng ba ga re zhes dris so/ /de nas des smras pa/ jo bo bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa sdud pa la phul
207b5(mdo sde): gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ dad pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyis rin po ches phyir blus nas/ chung ma de nyid la byin na de phyir len du ma btub ste/ bdag gis 'di yongs su btang ba lags so zhes byas so/ /khyim thab kyis smras
