226b6(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par
226b7(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur
227a1(mdo sde): ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang
227a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
227a3(mdo sde): de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu drang srong smra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
227a4(mdo sde): brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
227a5(mdo sde): te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes
227a6(mdo sde): par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po la gsol te/ yab bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ring po mi thogs par
227a7(mdo sde): rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas 'di ni ngas bcos su med do/ /bus smras pa/ rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi 'tshal gyis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu mi 'byung du mi gnang ngo / /de nas yab kyis ma gnang
227b1(mdo sde): nas des zhag gcig dang gnyis dang / gsum nas zhag drug gi bar du kha 'tshos so/ /de nas de'i zla grogs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol te/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ sras 'di ni rab tu byung na legs kyi de'u re 'dir 'gum na ma legs so/ /de nas
227b2(mdo sde): rgyal pos gnang nas dam 'char bcug ste/ nam khyod sde snod gsum ma lobs kyi bar du nga dang phrad du ma 'ong cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas re zhig na de yab kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad
227b3(mdo sde): pas ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs te/ rig pa dang grol bar smra bar chos ston par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgum gor ma chag snyam nas de yab kyi thad du song ste phrad nas dris pa/ bu cung zad lobs
227b4(mdo sde): pa lta yod dam/ des smras pa/ sde snod gsum lobs lags so/ /de nas des yab la chos de lta bu bstan te de thos nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te smras pa/ bu gcig khyod la ci dgos/ des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
227b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs la yo byad drug dbul bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgya ches ci dga' ba gyis shig /de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang bcas te zhal zas bzang pos tshim par
227b6(mdo sde): byas nas dge slong re re la yang yo byad drug drug phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
227b7(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gos su chos gos tshon can gyon la dge sbyong gi cha lugs 'di dang ldan te tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
228a1(mdo sde): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kr-i kI'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur to/ /dge slong
228a2(mdo sde): dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren
228a3(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
228a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //grags bshes zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
228a5(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gdon sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
228a6(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
228a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
228b1(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig
228b2(mdo sde): gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pas gnod pa byung ste slong bas kyang zas mi rnyed do/ /ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi 'bab par bstan pa las re
228b3(mdo sde): zhig na ded dpon de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas gang gi nyin par khye'u de btsas pa de kho na'i nyin
228b4(mdo sde): par nas than pa med par gyur to/ /de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di'i grags pa kun du rgyas
228b5(mdo sde): pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes zhes gdags sa zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u grags bshes pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de
228b6(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i
228b7(mdo sde): tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas
229a1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /
229a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste
229a3(mdo sde): des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/
229a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta
229a5(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
229a6(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de'i mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su dge slong skom pa rnams gung skyems la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du ba de'i
229a7(mdo sde): tshe yang de mi 'ong ngo / /de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod la skom pa'i gnod pa med ces byas so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na bdag la skom pa'i gnod
229b1(mdo sde): pa med do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa grags bshes 'dis las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mche ba gnyis las chab
229b2(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag grags bshes nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te
229b3(mdo sde): dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ grags bshes nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
229b4(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
229b5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la
229b6(mdo sde): skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
229b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig dge slong rgan po zhig la rab tu byung ba las/ de yang le lo can zhig ste gzhan la bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do/ /
230a1(mdo sde): de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyis bsnyen bkur byed par bskos pa dang de bdag ni bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du rgya cher 'dzin te/ dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed pas na/ de'i dge
230a2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad de phyis re zhig na nad kyis btab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blud nas de mtshan mo skom ste ci bya gtol med nas chu btung snyam ste bdag gi chu snod kyi drung du song na chu med par mthong ngo / /de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob
230a3(mdo sde): dpon dang / dge 'dun gyi drung tshang du song na de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo / /de nas re zhig na chu klung zlog byed kyi 'gram du song na de yang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dga' bar gyur nas bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang / dad
230a4(mdo sde): pas byin pa lci bar bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/ ras zhig der btags nas rang gi las rnams las bsams te las la rten cing 'dug go/ /de nas re zhig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs pa dang gtam de tshangs pa
230a5(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te phan tshun du bsnyad do/ /de nas de'i mkhan pos chu byin na de yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan
230a6(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gaN+DI rdungs shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas khang skyong gis gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus so/ /grong khyer bA rA Na sI thog thag tu yang
230a7(mdo sde): gtam de grags te sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so/ /de nas re zhig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug tu bcug nas ril ba spyi blugs chus bkang ste byin nas/ bu chu 'di dge 'dun la brims shig ces byas so/ /de nas 'bras bu mngon
230b1(mdo sde): sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la brims so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas 'jigs
230b2(mdo sde): pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na 'on kyang zad par ma gyur to/ /dge 'dun thams cad la brims na yang zad par ma gyur to/ /de nas lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan
230b3(mdo sde): can de mthong nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de'i rgyud la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chud par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar byas te/ lo khri nyis
230b4(mdo sde): stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu brims so/ /de nas phyis re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram
230b5(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par
230b6(mdo sde): byed par ma gyur cig / bdag gi mche ba'i phrag nas kyang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
230b7(mdo sde): grags bshes 'di yin te/ des lo khri nyis stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na tshe 'di la mche ba'i phrag nas chu 'byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu
231a1(mdo sde): nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
231a2(mdo sde): 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
231a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
231a4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
231a5(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
231a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing
231a7(mdo sde): gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku skrun pa'i yum dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston to/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu
231b1(mdo sde): chen po ni mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi
231b2(mdo sde): bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang
231b3(mdo sde): dag par dga' bar byed do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan
231b4(mdo sde): las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom
231b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa gsan tam/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ kye bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo
231b6(mdo sde): leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku skrun pa'i yum dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mngon
231b7(mdo sde): par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang
232a1(mdo sde): pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par dga'
232a2(mdo sde): bar byed do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te bla gos
232a3(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gis bcom
232a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig lags te/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ gal te btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na btsun pa maud gal gyi
232a5(mdo sde): bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas zhabs la phyag bzhes te gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg
232a6(mdo sde): par gnas sam zhes gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsungs shig / btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'khor bzhi po rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ 'di skad du btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams
232a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
232b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su
232b2(mdo sde): gsol zhes mchi'o zhes mol du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bar khas blangs par rig nas/
232b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na dper na mi stobs
232b4(mdo sde): po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring
232b5(mdo sde): ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu 'dug pa der son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos
232b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dzum dmul te bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na yang 'khor mang po dang bzhugs so
232b7(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang dbang med de/ gang gi tshe ngas deng
233a1(mdo sde): shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe ngas shog shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis nga'i bsam pa shes nas 'ong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu
233a2(mdo sde): chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad la bltas te/ bcom ldan
233a3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod lags so/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang mchis so/ /chos dang dge 'dun
233a4(mdo sde): dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par dgongs te tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po
233a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu
233a6(mdo sde): dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang
233a7(mdo sde): ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i
233b1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral na sa 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag
233b2(mdo sde): kyang yod do/ /de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad
233b3(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang
233b4(mdo sde): yod do/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha kha cig stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das
233b5(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so/ /lha gzhan dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
233b6(mdo sde): btsun pa bdag cag ni chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so/ /de nas der lha brgya phrag du ma dang / lha stong phrag du ma dang / lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan
233b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha rnams dong bar rig nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
234a1(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa
234a2(mdo sde): yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor
234a3(mdo sde): bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams
234a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
234a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i
234a6(mdo sde): gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu 'o na khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
234a7(mdo sde): nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sbron cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das
234b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas mi snang
234b2(mdo sde): bar gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling du son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbran pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa
234b3(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du
234b4(mdo sde): grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum bA ra'i drung du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dus so/ /de nas der
234b5(mdo sde): dge slong rdzus te skyes pa zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas/ re zhig na gdugs
234b6(mdo sde): tshod la bab pa dang sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang / lha'i zhal zas bza' ba dang bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/
234b7(mdo sde): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag la yang bkur sti legs par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
235a1(mdo sde): nas de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang /
235a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag
235a3(mdo sde): mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang /
235a4(mdo sde): bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rdzus
235a5(mdo sde): te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na de rdzus te skyes par gyur la/ 'dis sems bskyed pa'i mod la ci bsams pa dang / ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rdzus te
235a6(mdo sde): skyes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
235a7(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi
235b1(mdo sde): dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras
235b2(mdo sde): bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
235b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de
235b4(mdo sde): nas re zhig na grong med pa dgon pa'i gnas shig na dge slong lnga dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dge slong bzhi'i zhal ta byas nas/ de dag gis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
235b5(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong cig shos kyis ni de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag las brten te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa
235b6(mdo sde): dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag rab tu byung ste yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis brel bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus
235b7(mdo sde): te skyes pa 'di yin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na des rdzus te skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub
236a1(mdo sde): pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
236a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa de'i chung ma bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te nyam thag
236a3(mdo sde): pa'i skad 'byin cing ngu ba dang / des de'i sgra thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur te/ mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab
236a4(mdo sde): tu byung la/ ci nas bdag gis nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam gdab gor ma chag snyam ste/ de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas des smon lam btab pa/ dge
236a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye bar gyur cig / nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i
236a6(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin te/ smon lam btab pa des na rdzus te skyes par gyur to/ /des der dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de
236a7(mdo sde): ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par
236b1(mdo sde): smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par
236b2(mdo sde): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /
236b3(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
236b4(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
236b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i
236b6(mdo sde): gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des
236b7(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang
237a1(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa'i tshe shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thog thag mdzes par
237a2(mdo sde): byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas mdzes par byas pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming mdzes pa zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /

241b7(mdo sde): dang 'dres pa yin te/ de'i ni don chen po yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bde bar gnas pa ste/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa/ yang srid par skye bar byed pa rims nad dang bcas pa/ sdug bsngal
242a1(mdo sde): gyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa/ phyi ma la skye ba dang rga shir 'gyur ba rnams dang ma 'dres pa yin te/ de'i ni don chen po yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ ston pa yang mngon sum du bzhugs la chos
242a2(mdo sde): kyang ston te nye bar zhi bar byed pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/ bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab 'di ni snying khu btung bar 'os pa yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na bdag gi don dang /
242a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi don dang / gnyi ga'i don yang dag par mthong ba rnams kyis ni 'di la so so nas legs par bslab par bya ste/ ji ltar byas na bdag cag rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / bde ba skyed pa dang / bde ba'i rnam par smin par
242a4(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ gang dag gi gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams bdag cag gis longs spyod pa de dag gi bkur sti de dag kyang ji ltar byas na 'bras bu shin tu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che ba dang / rgya
242a5(mdo sde): che bar 'gyur ba zhig gu snyam du dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na rgyal po ka pi na chen po blon po khri brgyad stong gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i
242a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
242a7(mdo sde): cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
242b1(mdo sde): nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid
242b2(mdo sde): pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
242b3(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ka pi nas las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / blon po khri brgyad stong gi 'khor dang bcas par tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
242b4(mdo sde): sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ka pi na nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas
242b5(mdo sde): na ka pi na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
242b6(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar
242b7(mdo sde): yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
243a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba
243a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig gis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che mang po khyer te 'ongs nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
243a3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /gtsug lag khang yang brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul lo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka pi na 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag
243a4(mdo sde): ka pi nas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang
243a5(mdo sde): mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/
243a6(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de phyi zhig na blon po khri brgyad stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te/ skyed mos tshal gyi shing rnams me tog rgyas la/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug
243a7(mdo sde): dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du song ba las des skyed mos tshal der rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong nas/ des de la zla ba gsum gyi bar du phan pa'i zas kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang de'i sku
243b1(mdo sde): gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pas til mar gyis bskus te/ des na 'khor dang bcas pa tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der dbang po yongs su smin par
243b2(mdo sde): byas pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig

243b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
243b6(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
243b7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
244a1(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu gnyis
244a2(mdo sde): lon te/ lo bcu gnyis 'das nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'i tshe bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya stong phrag du mas bden pa mthong ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni ma gtogs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sras
244a3(mdo sde): kyi legs pa de dag mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te de'i blo skyes pa/ gal te bdag gi bu rab tu ma byung du zin na ni 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni 'di thor tshugs
244a4(mdo sde): can rab tu byung ba'i g.yog byas pa ni rab tu mi mdzes kyis bdag gis shAkya rnams las khyim re mi re rab tu 'byung du gzhug gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir grong khyer du dril bsgrags so/ /de nas shAkya thams
244a5(mdo sde): cad 'dus pa'i nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kye shAkya khyed rnams nyon cig /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung du zin na yang khyed kho nas 'di la bsnyen bkur bya dgos na/ da 'di rab tu byung gis shAkya khyim re mi re bsnyen bkur
244a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig ces byas so/ /de nas bzang ldan dang / ma 'gags pa dang / nam gru dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya'i bu lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar chas so/ /de nas de dag gi 'breg mkhan bsnyen bkur byed pa nye bar 'khor des de dag rab
244a7(mdo sde): tu 'byung ba mthong nas ngus so/ /de nas shAkya rnams kyis nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris so/ /de nas des snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra ste/ khyod rab tu byung na da bdag la zas dang gos kyis skyong ba su zhig mchis/ de nas
244b1(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor 'o na ras thing shig ces byas so/ /de nas des ras bting nas shAkya rnams kyis lus la thogs pa'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dpung rgyan dang / sor gdub
244b2(mdo sde): rnams phung po chen por spungs te byin no/ /de nas 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor gyis rab tu 'byung ba de dag kyang mthong la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la yang bltas nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa skyes te/ shAkya 'di dag ni cho rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / lang
244b3(mdo sde): tsho dang / 'byor pa dang ldan pa yin na/ 'on kyang btsun mo rnams dang / rgyan 'di dag mchil ma bzhin du bor nas rab tu byung na bdag ci yang mi bdog pa zhig gis da rgyan 'di dag khyim du bskur du ci yod de/ 'di dag btang la bdag kyang 'di dag gi rjes su
244b4(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag

244b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya dge slong gi cha lugs can rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal bar byas pa las de dag gis nye bar 'khor gyi rkang
244b7(mdo sde): pa ngo shes nas cho rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal du ma btub nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la bka' stsal pa/ bzang ldan gang gi phyir nga'i bstan pa 'di la ni cho rigs dang /

245b1(mdo sde): mchog tu dul zhing nye bar zhi ba dang ldan la phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa khyer te rigs ngan gyi khyim de nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po la dris pa/ 'di dge slong bzang ldan ma yin nam/ kha lo pas smras pa/ lha

246a7(mdo sde): khur ba 'dod pa'i phyir bu mo de bsnyags te nan gyis khur ba cig phrogs nas phan tshun du bros so/ /bu mo de yang de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bzhin no/ /de nas sprang po des tsham tshom med par chu klung zlog byed la 'bogs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams mi 'byung ba'i tshe na

246b7(mdo sde): par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
247a1(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/
247a2(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
247a3(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
247a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas
247a5(mdo sde): te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
247a6(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul gsus po che zhes bya ba na gsus po che'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul gsus po che na rgyal po sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba rgyal po
247a7(mdo sde): byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa
247b1(mdo sde): dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de nas de'i nu bo'i bu yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan
247b2(mdo sde): lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de gdul ba'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs
247b3(mdo sde): 'bring byas te yul gsus po cher bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / yul 'khor skyong gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
247b4(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te
247b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ bu khyod pha mas gnang ngam/ yul 'khor skyong gis gsol pa/ btsun pa ma gnang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu de bzhin gshegs pa
247b6(mdo sde): rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byung ba'am/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mi mdzad do/ /de nas yul 'khor skyong pha ma'i thad du song ste phyin nas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das
247b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid rgyas pa dang / btsun mo drug khri spangs nas dbu skra bregs te chos gos snam sbyar gsol nas yul gsus po che 'di nyid na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing bzhugs pa mthong gis/ bdag bcom
248a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ngo / /de nas de zhag gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum nas drug gi bar du kha 'tshos so/ /de
248a2(mdo sde): nas yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig /khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod kyis sdug ma myong
248a3(mdo sde): ba yin la tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/ /dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/ /gcig pu 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/ /dgon pa dang / nags khung dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang dkas/ bu
248a4(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyis shig / sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces de skad byas na yang khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul
248a5(mdo sde): 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis kyis nye du rnams la bskul te/ kye nye du rnams bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig ces byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas khyim bdag gi bu yul
248a6(mdo sde): 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig /khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod ni sdug ma myong ba yin la tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/ /dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/ /gcig
248a7(mdo sde): pu 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/ /dgon pa dang / nags khung dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang dkas/ bu yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyis shig /sbyin pa
248b1(mdo sde): dag kyang byin cig / bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces de skad byas na yang / khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis kyis yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams la bskul te/ kye byis pa

248b6(mdo sde): smras so/ /yab yum gnyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /des pa yul 'khor skyong gum na ci rung gis yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung du stsol cig dang / gal te rab tu 'byung ba la dga' bar gyur na ni gson por mchis na ni khyod
248b7(mdo sde): kyis gzigs par 'gyur grang / gal te dga' bar ma gyur na ni bu 'gro ba'i sa pha ma ma gtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so/ /pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/ byis pa dag gal te bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu byung ba'i 'og tu nged dang phrad du 'ong na ni de
249a1(mdo sde): bzhin du gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa yul 'khor skyong khyed rab tu 'byung
249a2(mdo sde): bar ni pha ma gnyis kyis gnang mod kyi/ gal te rab tu byung ba'i 'og tu phrad du 'ong na gdod gnang ngo zhes zer ro/ /yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ kye phrad par bgyi'o/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong khad kyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas/
249a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
249a4(mdo sde): bdag ni pha mas gnang lags na bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/
249a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ /de de ltar rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor
249a6(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
249a7(mdo sde): sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
249b1(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra
249b2(mdo sde): ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/
249b3(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa yul 'khor skyong gis las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa
249b4(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong
249b5(mdo sde): ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
249b6(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
249b7(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slon dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lus 'phags
250a1(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa pha rol gyi dmag tshogs byung ste/ ci bya gtol med nas nags khung du zhugs te/ de nyi ma gung la nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas gdungs nas dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te phan tshun 'khor 'khor nas lam
250a2(mdo sde): yang ma rnyed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ re zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig dgon pa

250a4(mdo sde): gi grong khyer du khrid de zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya
250a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig / 'di bas kyang ches khyad du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ bcom ldan

250a7(mdo sde): 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang
250b1(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po kr-i kI rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor

250b7(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no/ /yul 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na bram ze las
251a1(mdo sde): su rtsa ba rko ba zhig gnas pa de/ re zhig la rtsa ba rkor song ste nags khrod du 'khor 'khor ba las des der rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas de dad pa skyes te de la bsnyen bkur byas nas gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe yang bshos

251b1(mdo sde): ba dang ni sbed pa dang / /mi sdug pa dang gang gA pa/ /sen dang ni yang dag sdug /sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ /rab 'byor ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
